
1a1(rgyud 'grel): don dam bsnyen pa pad+ma dkar pos mdzad ba bzhugs/ /
1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI pa ra mArtha se ba/ bod skad du/ dpal don dam pa'i bsnyen pa/ dpal dus kyi
1b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khams gsum la ni ye shes nyin mor byed pa yi/ /dpal ldan shAkya'i seng ge byams pa'i
1b3(rgyud 'grel): mgon po dang/ /'jam dbyangs bcas pa yid bzhin nor dang grags pa dang/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
1b4(rgyud 'grel): te/ /lta ba drug gi gzhung mang rtog ge la sogs kyis/ /blo dman mi rnams kyis ni gang zhig brtag par dka' bas te/ / 
2a1(rgyud 'grel): mdor bsdus pas ni 'jig rten lugs ni spangs nas su/ /don dam bsnyen pa de ni bdag gis bshad par bya/ /
2a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i dngos grub slob dpon zhal gyi rjes 'brang bar/ /ma lus rdo rje theg par thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs/ /de phyir slob ma dam
2a3(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyis bla ma gser bzhin du/ /yongs su brtags na sdig pa cung zad yod ma yin/ /gang las khyab 'jug bde 'byung drag po
2a4(rgyud 'grel): zla ba dang/ /nyi ma rgyu skar sgra gcan gza' sogs gyur pa yi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yab de dag ni rnam spangs te/ /rmongs pas
2b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten mes po'i lam la len par byed/ /'jig rten ngag gi nges pa tshad mas dman pa ste/ /lta ba'i chos kyi dbye bdag gi rnam pa mang/ /rig byed
2b2(rgyud 'grel): rtogs par dka' zhing dran pa tha dad pas/ /'jig rten 'dir ni mkhas pa rnams kyis gang zhig 'dzin/ /thams cad mkhyen pa yis ni gsungs pa'i don
2b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan la/ /lus mang po yis de ni gzhan du 'chad par byed/ /lta ba drug tu gnas pa bla mar rab grags pa/ /khams ni rab tu rgyas dang mnyam pa
2b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyid log khams/ /bla ma'i zhal gyis dman pa dag gis rgyud thos zer/ /mngon par dbang bskur mi 'gyur lam ni ma thob par/ /rdo rje slob dpon go
2b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phang chen po 'dir byed de/ /skye bo rmongs pa 'di la ci zhig spyad pa'o/ /nor 'dod brkam pas mngon par dbang ni skur bar byed/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor
3a1(rgyud 'grel): rdul tshon dag gis bri byed de/ /rdo yi rang bzhin 'dod pa'i rtags la mchod par byed/ /'bar ba'i thab khung du ni mar la sogs pa sreg /oM yig
3a2(rgyud 'grel): hUM yig ces ni 'dod pa'i sngags yin te/ /gzhan la phan pa ru ni 'di nyid brjod pa yin/ /blo gros nyams pa yis ni 'di dag mi shes te/ /gang zhig sgra tsam dag
3a3(rgyud 'grel): ni de nyid sngags su 'gyur/ /ngang pa'i rgyal med mtsho yi pad+ma'i lte ba ni/ /g.yo can bya dkar dag ni shin tu mdzes par 'gyur/ /nya yi rigs la de ni gsod
3a4(rgyud 'grel): pas ga? pa ltar/ /bla ma ngan pa 'gro ba rnams la de bzhin no/ /pad+ma'i snying po ltar ni mgrin pa brdungs nas su/ /g.yo can rkang pa ya gcig gis ni gnas pa
3a5(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /chu skyes 'dis ni nya rnams 'khrul pa byed pa ltar/ /bla ma ngan pa 'gro ba rnams la bya dkar bzhin/ /ji ltar zlos gar mkhan gyi gar gyi ngo bo bsgyur/ /
3b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba lha yi dbang po'i gzugs su byed pa ltar/ /lam dag med dang nor la 'dod cing brkam pa yis/ /de bzhin dbang la rgyal ba'i cod pan 'ching bar byed/ /'dod la lhag zhen chang gis dbang gi bag med cing//
3b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i sems dang bcas shing rdzas la mang du zhen/ /bden pa ma yin smra zhing bu rnams bslu 'dod pa/ /bla ma de yis sdug bsngal ste rab ngo mtshar med/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal me dag gis ni gdungs pa
3b3(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /rab rib mig gis bla ma dag gis gzung byas pa/ /shin tu gdung ba gzhom phyir lam chen gnas pa yi/ /gnyid log sbrul gyi dug gis 'khrul pa bzhin du'o/ /chos la zhen dang mya ngan 'das pa'i
3b4(rgyud 'grel): bde ba la/ /rab zhen sems ldan rmongs pa'i skye bdu ma la/ /yongs su brtags na dmyal ba'i me ni ster ba po/ /bla ma ngan pa ci yi phyir na bsten par byed/ /'khor ba ngang ni mya ngan 'das pa'i dngos nyams pa/ /
3b5(rgyud 'grel): shes dang nges zhugs snying rje la sogs tha mi dang/ /dbang po bral zhing rtog pa rtag par ru ni dang/ /gnyis su med cing kun 'gro nges par zhi ba nyid/ /de yang dang po'i sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' dpal//
3b6(rgyud 'grel): de nyid 'jig rten mgon dang dpal ldan 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /de ni thugs kyi rdo rje rdo rje mkha' 'gro dpal/ /de ni mi 'gyur 'gyur med rnal 'byor gyis ni bgrod/ /de ni dbang phyug khyab 'jug dag dang mes?
4a1(rgyud 'grel): po ste/ /bdun sogs 'joms med bde gshegs rgyal dbang po/ /grags pa de ni thub pa shAkya seng ge dpal/ /de ni sangs rgyas thams cad dpal ldan dus 'khor lo/ /sprul pa
4a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar zhi bde ni bla ma dpal/ /rab tu sbas pa'i sangs rgyas bde ster sa gzhi la/ /bdud kyi dgra gcig skyes 'gro yin rtsi lag gcig /bla ma dam pa bsten pa rnams la yid bzhin nor/ /
4a3(rgyud 'grel): srid pa'i bsam gtan chags nyams bsgom pa po/ /chags chen 'dod chags chen po la ni thugs bcings pa/ /dbang po gnyis bde sbyor zhing brtul zhugs chen po can/ /phyag rgya dag la sbyor
4a4(rgyud 'grel): yang chags pa nyams mi mnga' / /nyi zla dag gi lam la rnal 'byor nyams pa dang/ /shes rab me la rnal 'byor stobs kyis rab tu zhugs/ /dpag med bde ba'i bdud rtsi btung la chags pa ste/ /
4a5(rgyud 'grel): sdig 'phrog rdo rje 'dzin pa de ni bla ma dpal/ /bu bzangs dag ni rnam par spangs nas tshol mi byed/ /bde bar 'ongs pa sbyin pa ru ni mi gtong pa/ /rnyed pa'i don la sogs pa ru ni 'dod ma yin/ /
4a6(rgyud 'grel): rnyed pa'i nor ni nye bar longs ni spyod mdzad pa/ /bla med rgyud kyi gsung ni yang dag ston pa'o/ /yon tan ldan pa'i sras rnams la ni 'khor ba 'dzoms/ /rang lus tshangs pa'i 'jig
4b1(rgyud 'grel): rten nas ni kun tu ston/ /de ni bla ma'i dpal te bla ma dpal gzhan min/ /dpag med sangs rgyas kyis ni rtag tu de la mchod/ /phyogs bzhugs byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu de la 'dud/ /grub pa rnams kyis rdo rje'i glu mang de la len/ /srid pa'i dgon par lhung la lam ni ston pa po//
4b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa phal par zhen pa bla ma dpal ma yin/ /legs longs nor la zhen pa bla ma dpal ma yin/ /skyes bu mkhas pa smod byed dpal ldan bla ma min/ /sems can snying brtse rnam spangs dpal ldan bla ma min/ /dge 'dun dkor la rab spyod dpal ldan bla ma min/ /nor med
4b3(rgyud 'grel): slob ma 'dor ba dpal ldan bla ma min/ /bsgoms zin las rnams ster ba dpal ldan bla ma min/ /bu bzangs kha sdoms byed pa dpal ldan bla ma min/ /bu bzangs de nyid sbed pa dpal ldan bla ma min/ /bu bzangs slu bar 'dod pa dpal ldan bla ma min/ /bu bzangs yun
4b4(rgyud 'grel): rings khro ba dpal ldan bla ma min/ /bu bzangs spong bar 'dod pa dpal ldan bla ma min/ /ye shes dbang gis khengs bcas dpal ldan bla ma min/ /rdzas kyi dbang gis rab dga' dpal ldan bla ma min/ /phran tshogs khyim du bsti 'dod dpal ldan bla ma min/ /rgyal srid
4b5(rgyud 'grel): sde la rab bzhugs dpal ldan bla ma min/ /rang gi mgrin par skud 'chang dpal ldan bla ma min/ /khyab 'jug dbyu gu 'chang ba dpal ldan bla ma min/ /thal bas lus la byugs pa dpal ldan bla ma min/ /ral pa sbyangs dang skra bregs dpal ldan bla ma
4b6(rgyud 'grel): min/ /mgo bo'i thod pa 'chang ba dpal ldan bla ma min/ /gcer bu dang ni skra 'bal dpal ldan bla ma min/ /dben pa'i dbang gis rab dga' dpal ldan bla ma min/ /lus la dmar po'i gos gyon dpal ldan bla ma min/ /pus 'khyud rab tu 'ching ba dpal
4b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan bla ma min/ /bsngags bzlos bgrang phreng can ni dpal ldan bla ma min/ /chang gi dbang gi bag med dpal ldan bla ma min/ /srog chags rnams la sems sdang dpal ldan bla ma min/ /bde ba'i dbang gis rab dga' dpal ldan bla ma min/ /sdug bsngal
5a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang gis gdungs pa dpal ldan bla ma min/ /thar pa'i lam la bag med dpal ldan bla ma min/ /lam las nyams pa'i sems ldan dpal ldan bla ma min/ /ku 'gro chos ni nyams pa dpal ldan bla ma min/ /rang dbang sdug bsngal byed pa dpal
5a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan bla ma min/ /mkhar gsil lhung bzed lag 'chang dpal ldan bla ma min/ /bla gab med pa'i rnal 'byor dpal ldan bla ma min/ /shing gi drung na gnas pa dpal ldan bla ma min/ /sdug bsngal ster ba'i phyag dar dpal ldan bla ma min/ /dus su za ba'i dge slong dpal
5a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan bla ma min/ /skye bo med pa'i rdzong nas dpal ldan bla ma min/ /brag phugs rnams su rab zhugs dpal ldan bla ma min/ /gang zhig yon tan rin phung dang la ldan bla ma de/ /gang zhig srid pa'i skyon 'joms dpal ldan bla ma de/ /gang zhig snyan pa'i ngag smra dpal ldan bla ma de/
5a4(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig lam bzang ston pa'i dpal ldan bla ma de/ /gang zhig dmyal ba'i me 'joms dpal ldan bla ma de/ /gang zhig srid pa'i phar sgrol dpal ldan bla ma de/ /gang zhig 'gro ba'i gnyen cig dpal ldan bla ma de/ /gang zhig 'gro ba'i mig gcig dpal ldan bla ma de/ /gang zhig
5a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i rje gcig dpal ldan bla ma de/ /gang zhig 'gro ba'i zla gcig dpal ldan bla ma de/ /gang zhig skye 'gro'i nyi gcig dpal ldan bla ma de/ gang zhig bde gshegs rje rigs dpal ldan bla ma de/ /gang zhig mi zad lam ston dpal bla ma de/ /gang zhig mgrin par thos
5a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin dpal ldan bla ma de/ /gang zhig mi 'gyur dbus 'dzin dpal ldan bla ma de/ /gang zhig yon tan rdul lus dpal ldan bla ma de/ /gang zhig rgyal ba'i spyod 'ching dpal ldan bla ma de/ /gang zhig lus kyi go 'dzin dpal ldan bla ma de/ /gang zhig skra 'bal ba yi dpal ldan
5a7(rgyud 'grel): bla ma de/ /gang zhig srid gdug gcer bu dpal ldan bla ma de/ /gang zhig dus gos 'dzin pa'i dpal ldan bla ma de/ /gang zhig bdud rtsi'i 'thung chags dpal ldan bla ma de/ /gang zhig dam tshig la zhugs dpal ldan bla ma de/ /gang zhig lus srung 'dod pa'i dpal ldan bla
5b1(rgyud 'grel): de// gang zhig rlung gi ? ldan dpal ldan bla ma de/ /gang zhig rgyal ba'i shing drung dpal ldan bla ma de/ /gang zhig brtul zhugs snod 'dzin dpal ldan bla ma de/ /gang zhig bde ba'i khrod 'dzin dpal ldan bla ma de/ /mi zad dus za'i dpal ldan bla ma de/ /gang zhig nam mkha' i gnas zhugs dpal ldan bla ma de/
5b2(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig nam mkha' phugs zhugs dpal ldan bla ma de/ /gang zhig sems can mnyam sems dpal ldan bla ma de/ /'jigs med dag gsum ster ba bla ma dpal gang de/ /dpal ldan bla ma de ni ci phyir bsten mi bya/ /dpal ldan bla ma de ni ci phyir mchod mi bya/ /dpal ldan bla ma de bci? phyir
5b3(rgyud 'grel): ? bya/ /mal stan bzhon pa bran khol zho chas 'tsho rnams dang/ /yan lag bzang po bu mo mdzes ma rnams dang ni/ /chung ma snying sdug bu dang rtsa lag bcas pa dang/ /ma lus pa yis kyang ni bde ba ster ba la'o/ /sA lu'i zan dang sha dang dri zhim mar dag dang/ /bza? dang bcad
5b4(rgyud 'grel): ba? sbyin pa yid 'ongs mang po dang/ /gtam po la dang ga? kha bshal bzang po dang/ /gla rtsil sogs la'i bdud mang dgra la'o/ /rab tu 'chang ba'i do shal nor bu rna cha dang/ /ske rags dang bcas rkang gdub yan lag srung dang ni/ /cod pan dang bcas dpung rgyun rke nor bzang sogs
5b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ sna tshogs na bza' yis ni sdug bsngal mang 'joms la'o/ /byug pa dang ni gur gum tsandan lnga sogs pa/ /a ka ru nag si hA la sogs spos dang ni/ /tsam pa ka mchog la sogs dri zhim me tog dang/ /rin chen mar mes lam ni mi nyams la'o/ /rtsod ldan dbang gis bla
5b6(rgyud 'grel): ma skyon dang yon tan 'dres/ /rnam pa kun tu sdig pa med pa yod pa yin/ /gang zhig yon tan lhag pa ? legs dpyad nas /bu rnams kyis ni de la brten par 'gyur ba'o/ /rdo dang shing gi rang bzhin sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/ /skye ba 'bum phrag gis ni thar pa mi ster ro/ /skye ba 'di nyid du
5b7(rgyud 'grel): ? gang zhig brtag pa ni/ /bla ma /sten? pa yis ni bde ba ster bar mdzad/ /spun dag chung ma snying sdug grogs po mgon po dang/ /bla ma dag dang mtshungs pa'i pha ma yod ma yin/ /skye ba 'di nyid du yang sdug bsngal 'joms pa yi/ /rdo rje 'dzin 'dzin pa'i dpal bzangs dag gis ster pa'o/ /shin tu
6a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa'i blo yis bsten bya yis/ /ji ltar gyi dus sdug bsngal ster bar min ba'o/ /ma dag sems kyis bsten pas sdug bsngal 'gyur ba ste/ /dper na rims nad rgyas pa la ni mar gyi btung ba bzhin/ /'di ltar bden pa'i don du bla mas ma byas pas/ nyamS
6a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems kyis sdug bsngal mang du ster bar byed/ /shing las ring du ltung ba'i sdug bsngal mchog min pas/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu sngon du bor ba mchog yin no/ /ltos 'gro'i dug ni gyur du khyab pa dag dang ni/ /gdong lnga pa dang nges par glang po che dang ni/ /khro bo chen po'i gshin rje kha ni
6a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog yin kyi/ /gdug pa'i slob mas bla ma la ni brten pa min/ /dpal ldan bla ma'i zhabs la brten par 'dod pa de/ /rab tu khros pas skye ba brgya du mi 'dod pa'o/ /de phyir rang gi blo yis dbyad nas ni/ /bsten par bya yi khro ? ni mi bya'o/ /rdob dang ni shing gi rang
6a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gzugs brnyan gyi /de la pha rol zhen pas 'dir ni mchog byed cing /gang zhig sems dang bcas pas yon tan rgya mtsho yi/ /bla ma chen po yongs su sun 'dod te/ /du ma'i bdud dang dmyal ba'i me ni skyong ba dang/ /bgegs dang log 'dren rnams kyis rtag tu de
6a5(rgyud 'grel): bzung ste/ /sems bcas bsal ba rgyal ba'i dbang bo spangs nas ni/ /gang zhig sems med pa la rab tu mchod byed do/ /'jam pa'i dpal ni dang po'i sangs rgyas yin pa la/ /ston pa gzhan dag rnams la mchod pa mdzad pa ni/ /ci phyir zhen sems can gdul ba'i
6a6(rgyud 'grel): don yin gyi/ /gzhan du thar pa la ni 'dod cing chags pas min/ /de bzhin bla mas 'dod ba'i rtagS ni bkod nas su/ /mi shes 'jig rten rnams kyi bsod nams rgyu ru ni/ /phyag mang ba dang mchod pa dag kyang mdzad pa ste/ /'on kyang mya ngan 'das ba'i lam la
6a7(rgyud 'grel): chags pa min/ /chung ma bu dang rtsa lag mang po'i sde rnams dang/ /so bo nor dang rgyal srid dgra med phyogs dang ni/ /grub pa nyid dang dbang po drang srong dang bcas pa/ re shig lus po 'di ni mi rtag pa nyid do/ /khams gsum rnam pa brtan dang g.yo ba ni/ /cung zhig mi
6b1(rgyud 'grel): bzad ba ni gal te 'dir mthong dang/ /gang zhig dngos po'i gzugs ni mi shigs yod 'gyur na/ /'di rnams dag la gti mug ched du chags par gyis/ /ji srid 'chi bdag rab tu ma sad bar du ni/ /de srid du ni khyod kyis lus 'di srung bar gyis/ /'di ni rab tu sad na khyod kyis bsrungs na yang/ /lus
6b2(rgyud 'grel): ni nges pa ru ni ce spyad rnams la ster/ /de bzhin chung ma dang ni bu dang rtsa lag dang/ /grogs dang mgon po dag la skyabs su song na yang/ /'bar ba la sogs pa la dus kyis byin pas na/ /dbang po la sogs kyi ni bsrung bar nus ma yin/ /grub pa dang ni drang srong lta yi dbang po
6b3(rgyud 'grel): dang? dpag med bgrang du med pa de yis zad par khrid/ /ye shes me ni ji srid mthong bar ma gyur par/ rang gi las dag su zhig gis ni bzlog par 'gyur/ /'di dag thams cad mi rtag 'dod pa ma yin te/ /ye shes bdud rtsi bla ma'i zhal ni 'dod pa'o/ /gnyis po 'di las bde dang
6b4(rgyud 'grel): sdug? bsngal rab tu skyed/ /nges par legs par brtags na ci zhig len/ /'khor ba'i rdzong dag tu ni 'khyam pa'i rang bzhin can/ /ji srid rang gi lus la mchod par byed pa bas/ /mya ngan las 'das bde ba ma lus ster mdzad pa/ /de srid de ni bla mar ci yi phyir mi byed/ /rang gis
6b5(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa'i nor rnams kun kyang byin nas ni/ /dmyal ba'i me ster bu ga len par byed/ /sangs rgyas yan lag bzang mo 'khyud pa ster mdzad gang/ /ci phyir bzang mo de ni bla ma la mi 'bul/ /so ba dang ni nor rnams yid du 'ong ba dang/ /yan lag bzang mo dag ni bsod
6b6(rgyud 'grel): nams stobs las 'gyur/ /sdig pa dag gi dbang gis yun rings bsags pa yi/ /rab tu 'bad de bsrung bar byas kyang nyams par 'gyur/ /de phyir khyad par 'phags shing yid du 'ong ba yi/ /skye ba du ma ru ni bde ba ster byed pa/ /gang la nges par phul bas rab tu 'gyur
6b7(rgyud 'grel): ba yi/ nor rnams kun gyis bla ma'i zhal la dbul bar bya byin pa'i nor rnams 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba ni/ /shin tu rnam dags la sa bon btab pa bzhin/ /de rnams rab tu ma byin 'bras bu med pa ni/ /dper nas bzang dag la sa bon ma btab par/ /sa bon ma btab zhing
7a1(rgyud 'grel): la 'bru yi ched du ni/ /rmongs pa shin tu nyon mongs par ni byed pa ltar/ /bla ma la ni nor ma phul ba de bzhin du/ /'dzin par 'dod pa dag ni sa la 'khyam par byed/ /nor la 'dod cing brkam pas zhing gi las la ni/ /rten dang chong dang rig pa dag ni 'dzin par byed/ /de
7a2(rgyud 'grel): ltar na yang bkren pa'i dus ni du ma ru/ /myung ba dag tu 'ongs nas sdig can la ni gnas/ /nyon mongs ma gtogs 'bru dang gser dang chung ma dang/ /bsod nams mang byed pa la bsam mi khyab par 'gyur/ /grub pa nyid dang dbang po drang srong mchog rnams dang/ /dgra med rgyal
7a3(rgyud 'grel): srid sa gzhi'i bde ba ster pa'o/ /khams gsum dag na gang dag bde ba cung zad ni/ /ma lus de ni bla ma dgyes pa'i stobs kyis so/ /bkres dang nad dang dmyal ba'i me yi sdug bsngal ni/ /mi bzad de ni mi dgyes pa las byung ba yin/ /bla ma'i drin gyis 'dod pa'i dngos grub
7a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bla med rgyud gsungs pa/ /de ni ma dgyes pa yis dmyal bar 'jug pa yi/ tshig 'di nyid ni de dang de'i rgyud la gnas/ /yon tan dam pas gang bar bla ma'i thugs shes nas/ /'khor ba'i rgyu ru gang rnams kyis ni dor bar byed/ /grangs
7a5(rgyud 'grel): med bskal par bde ba nyams pa de rnams ni/ /rdo rje me yis smin pa'i dmyal ba dag tu 'tshed/ /bla ma dam pa slu bar byed dang sdig sogs gang/ /slob ma 'ba' zhig rnams ni de ru mi 'tshed kyi/ /de bzhin bla ma yang ni zhen pa'i dbang gis nyams/ /chags pa la sogs
7a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i me la rab tu 'jug/ bla ma dang ni slob ma nges par rnam par nyams/ /rang rang sdug bsngal 'di ni gnyis ka'i ? mod ngo/ /de bas bla ma slob ma 'di ru nyams pa ni/ /rang gi blo yis ring du yongs su slong? bar byed/ /smyon pa rdo rje'i sen mo gdong pa lnga pa dang/ /
7a7(rgyud 'grel): rkang brgyad khro bo'i gdong la mche ba dang ldan dang/ /shin tu khro ba'i gdengs ka 'dzin pa mchog yin gyi/ /lam nyams bla ma slob ma dag ni 'di ltar min/ /bla ma ltung ba las ni slob ma me ltung ba/ /slob ma ltung ba yis ni bla ma yang mi nyams/ /shing gi yal ge mthon
7b1(rgyud 'grel): por 'dzeg pa dag las ni/ /gang zhig ltung bar gyur pa de ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /bla na med pa'i rgyud las ltung ba bzhi yis ni/ /rtsa ba dang bcas dngos grub dag ni 'phrog par byed/ /dpag med bskal pa ru ni bde ba rnam par nyams/ /las dan la gnas dbang bskur slob ma rnams la gsung/ /bla ma'i
7b2(rgyud 'grel): sems sun? pa yis ltung ba gcig yin te/ /bka' ni yongs su spangs pa'i dbang las gnyis pa'o/ /spun? la rab tu khros nas smra ba gsum pa ste/ /byams pa yongs su spangs pa'i dbang gis bzhi pa'o/ /dpal ldan byang chub sems spangs dbang gis mnga' zhes bya/ /grub pa'i mdza' 
7b3(rgyud 'grel): la skyon bzung bas ni drug pa ste/ /sngags pa min la phebs par smra bas ri zhes bya/ /phung po so sor nyon mongs byed pa brgyad ba yin/ /dag pa'i chos la ma dang pas ni gza' zhes bya/ /gdug pa dang bcas byams pa bzung bas phyogs zhes so/ /dam pa'i chos la kun rtog dbang giS
7b4(rgyud 'grel): drag po zhes/ /dag pa'i sems can sun 'byin pa yis nyi ma ste/ /dam tshig bsten par ma byas pa yis yan lag med/ /bud med rnams la bshud ba yis ni bcu bzhi yin/ /'di rnams dag ni yongs su spang bar byas nas ni/ /'dod pa'i blo yis bla ma la ni bsten par bya/ /
7b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chagS la sogs pa dang mi shes dbang gis na/ /bag med slob ma rnams ni gal te ltung 'gyur na/ /slar yang rab tu gnas par bya phyir dbang nyid ni/ /phyir bzlog pa la 'di ni nges par bya ba'o/ /dbang bdun bskur ba rnams la zlog pa yod pa ste/ /mi shes dbang gis gsang
7b6(rgyud 'grel): ba la ni rgyal man/ /shes rab mngon par dbang bskur ba la ldog med de/ /dper na mi yi bdag pho stsal du shi bzhin no/ /lta mo re re'i rgyal ba'i sngags ni brjod ba lta?/ /stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug po ni nges bya zhing/ /bzlas pa dag gi mdza' du chogs kyis tshim par bya/ /
7b7(rgyud 'grel): thun mong skyon gyis kyang ni chad pa 'di nyid yin/ /ji ltar rang gi nus pas bla ma la ni yon/ /phul nas rang gi rigs su thun mongs pa ru 'gyur/ /de yi sems kyi rten dag shes par byas nas ni/ /lhag pa 'am ni nyung bar bla mas nges par sbyin/ /chags dang bzlas pa 'am ni
8a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa dag gis te/ /de rnams la ni bla ma dag par rab sbyin bya/ /shin tu ring ba'i shing las ring bor lhung gyur pa'i/ /lus bo la ni rkang pas brdog par mi bya'o/ /de dag rnams kyi sems la skyon ni rjes gnas pa/ /'di rnams chad pa ci zhig sangs
8a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyis mkhyen te/ /de ltar na yang rmongs pas rab sad bya ba'i phyir/ /chad pa sbyin gyi 'di ni chad pa ma yin no/ /gang zhig sems la gnas pa'i ma lus mkhyen pa yi/ /rje mo dang bcas bde bar gshegs pas 'chad pa sol/ /dge dang mi dge las kyi 'bras bu de
8a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams la/ /chad pa gang ster bla ma 'dir ni gang zhig yin/ /dpyid zla 'bring po'i dkar po'i phyogs kyi cha la ni/ /dpal ldan dkyil 'khor de ni legs par bris nas su/ dre mo zer/ bla mas mngon par dbang bskur rnam bdun sbyin bya zhing/ /dpal ldan bstan pa'i
8a4(rgyud 'grel): don du 'khor lo mchod par bya/ /mchod pa med pas nges par dus kyi 'khor lo ni/ /bstan pa dag ni dag pa'i lo 'di ma yin no/ /gal te gang zhig skal ldan thos 'dod slob ma ni/ /'khor lo'i mchod pa bcu gnyis dag ni de yis bya/ /ji ltar bu bzangs? kyis ni
8a5(rgyud 'grel): bag ma blang ba'i rgyur/ /rang gi ba la nam yang gsol ba mi 'debs te/ /yon tan dang bcas dus la bab pa'i bul ni/ /pha nyid kyis ni bagma'i bya ba shes par byed/ /de bzhin slob ma rnams kyis bla med dbang gi phyir/ bla ma la ni nan gyis gsol ba mi gdab
8a6(rgyud 'grel): po/ bdag gi slob ma skal ba ldan nam mi ldan pa'i/ /rnam par dag pa'i de nyid de la de yis shes/ /rnam par dag pa'i slob ma de ni med pa la/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyu ru dbang bskur rin po che/ /rang gi ngag gis kun nas rnam par dag pa 'di/ /mchod ba med na'ang
8a7(rgyud 'grel): bla ma yis ni sbyin par bya/ /chags pas mngon par khengs pa'i nga rgyal can dang ni/ /chags pas bag med g.yo can gyi ni mi la ni/ /gang zhig rgyal ba'i bka' yis thar pa'i 'bras bu ster/ /bla ma'i zhal gyis de nyid byin lam byin pa'o/ /gang gi yid kyi rang bzhin
8b1(rgyud 'grel): gang gis shes na ni/ /ston pa de yis de la rang gi zhal sbyin no/ /gang zhig dag pa'i slob ma'i rang bzhin shes pa yi/ /mngon shes dang ldan bla ma gang yang yong ma yin/ /ma dag pa yi sems la bla ma'i 'dod pa'i zhal/ /rims nang rab rgyas rnams la mar gyis
8b2(rgyud 'grel): btung ba bzhin/ /byin nas rang gi lus la 'chi ba chen por byed/ /bde ba 'khrul pa'i bzhin du blo gros nyams pa la/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan mnyam pa'i bde ba'i rgyur/ /rang gi sems ni so sor snang ba tsam du bsgom/ /dmyal pa'i sdug bsngal
8b3(rgyud 'grel): ster ba de nyid ni/ /rang gi sems kyi skyon gyis bdud du skye brar? 'gyur/ /rdo rje dag gis sprul pa'i gzugs rnams du ma ni/ /sdig pa'i stobs kyis khyad par du ni rgyud pa ste/ /gshin rje'i gnas ni gdug pa'i 'khor gyis yongs gang ba/ /gshin rje khros pas rdo rje'i me
8b4(rgyud 'grel): ni smin pa'o/ /de phyir bla ma dang ni rgyal ba'i dbang po gzugs/ /rnam par ma dag blo yis bsten par mi bya'o/ /dper na rgyal po'i dbyug pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor rnams kyis/ /dga' dang khro bas bde dang sdug bsngal ster ba bzhin/ /ma dag sems kyis 'di ni shi bar gyur
8b5(rgyud 'grel): pa na/ gshin rje khro bo'i gdong pa rab tu gtum pa dang/ /rdo rje me ni smin pa mi bzad mthong nas ni/ /nyon mongs kha yis ha ha'i sgra ni smra bar byed/ /sngon du bsags pa'i las kyis 'bras bu rab tu rgyas/ /khyod kyi 'dir ni nges par longs spyod pa ru gyis/ /bla ma la sogs
8b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyod par byas dang bag med dang/ /sdang ba khyod kyis nga yis bka' la ci zhig byed/ /'dod pa'i blo gros dpal ldan rdo rje can gyis ni/ /mi bzang dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal lung las ma gsungs sam/ /sdig pa'i stobs kyis rab tu khyab pa dag tu 'gyur/ /sdang pa
8b7(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni ci yi phyir na sdig pa byed/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyis dman slob ma rnam dag pa/ /gang gi bka' yis thar pa'i go 'phang 'gro bar 'gyur/ /rab zhi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dpal ldan bla ma de/ 'khor ba'i rgyu ru khyod kyis kyang ni 'dor byed dam/ /gshin rje'i
9a1(rgyud 'grel): bka' yis khro bo'i 'khor rnams kyis bzung ste/ /rab tu 'dar zhing gshin rje me rab gtum pa yi/ /smin par zhugs shing sogs le dang ni rtse gsum gyis/ /blo gros rnam par nyams la gcod dang 'bigs par byed/ /slob ma dmus
9a2(rgyud 'grel): long de ni 'di ru ngo mtshar med/ /mig dang bcas pa'i bla ma long ba ngo mtshar che/ /rgyud rnams thos nas nor dang 'dod chags la zhen pa/ /de la yang ni nges par ston pa'i zhal med do/ /rgyal srid dpal ni ma lus rnam par spangs nas su/ /dpag med sangs
9a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rnams kyis byang chub yang dag bsten/ /skal ldan yon tan rnams kyi de ni nges par ltag/ de bas rgyal ba rnams kyis nam yang mi 'dor ro/ /bde ba rnam par ma mnyams thar pa'i dpal de ni/ /bor nas yan lag bzang po bor nas na chung dag la mos/
9a4(rgyud 'grel): sngon du bsags pa'i las ni nges par drag po ste/ /gang gis bdud rtsi bor nas dug ni 'thung bar byed/ /gzhan dag rnams ni bud med lus kyi 'dod chags zhen/ /lus po spyin par byas nas nor ni 'dzin par byed/ /shin tu bsod pa'i zas la zhen pa'i nya
9a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du/ /skad cig bde ba'i rgyu yis rab tu nyams par 'gyur/ /bram ze gang gi rang gzugs pags pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /dga' ma la ni so sor brten pa'i don dag tu/ /'jug dogS dag tu song nas slar yang 'ongs nas ni/ /gzugs brnyan 'dod ma de ni
9a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzes ma mos pa med/ /de bzhin du ni rgyal ba'i sprul pa'i sku dag la/ /'jug dags la brten rang gi don 'dod du ma dang/ /'khor ba'i bde ba so sor zhen cing don du ster zer chags pa can/ /bstan pa'i rtag la gus byed rnams kyis mchod mi byed/ gzhan dag kyang ni 'dod
9a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dngos grub dag la zhe na/ /bri ya gang dang n+ya gro d+ha 'og gang gi gnas/ /'jigs byed ri dang 'jug ngogs dang ni gzhan dag la/ /lam las rnam par nyams pa rnams ni ltung bar 'gyur/ /bram ze rnams la rang nor ma lus byin nas ni/ /nyi ma zla ba gza' yis zin par lhung
9b1(rgyud 'grel): bar byad/ /thub par dka' ba'i bdud kyi tshogs kyis rnam par rmongs/ 'khor ba'i 'brog tu lam ni rnam par nyams pa yin/ /mi rnams gang zhig bla ma dam pa'i zhal dman pas/ /mi bzad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par brnag bzod cing/ /lam ngan yang dag 'dres pa'i dbang
9b2(rgyud 'grel): gis rnam nyams te/ /dper na dgon par zhugs pa'i ded dpon dang mtshungs so/ /des na bla ma thar pa'i lam ni ster ba po/ /slob ma yis ni shin tu gus pas bsten bya ste/ /chung ma dang ni bu dang g.yo ba ma lus dang/ /lus dang ngag dang yid ni g.yo ba med pas so/ /thun mtshams gsum du
9b3(rgyud 'grel): shin tu rnam par dag pa yis/ /kha dang lag brkang? pa dag ni khrus byas te/ /me tog yang dag blangs nas bla ma'i spyan sngar ni/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu zlum par bya/ /bla ma'i zhabs kyi chu skyes me tog gis mchod cing/ /shin tu gus pas spyi bo lag pas
9b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag bya'o/ /bla ma'i zhal nas bka' ni rab tu thos nas su/ /sal 'khod de rang gi khyim du 'gro bar bya/ /bla ma dag gi spyan sngar rkang pa brkyang ba dang/ /gdug pa'i kha yis rab tu brjod pa dag dang ni/ /g.yan pa 'phrug dang tsug dang ni bzhad gad dang/ /skye bu gzhan gyi skyon brjod
9b5(rgyud 'grel): gtam ni mi bya'o/ /lam bzang shes pa sngon du 'gro bar mi bya ste/ /gnang ba blangs nas mi shes pa la 'gro bar bya/ /bla mas byin pa lag pa gnyis kyis blang bya zhing/ /rang gis 'bul na spyi bo yis ni phyag bya'o/ /bla ma 'gron nas byon 'dir shin tu gus pa yis/ /phrag dog yongs su
9b6(rgyud 'grel): spangs pa'i rgyu du? sdug pa ni/ /bde ba ster ba'i don du dga' bar byas nas ni/ /rang gi phyag rgya rab tu sbyangs te dbul bar bya/ /ji ltar rang gi sems ni skyo bar mi 'gyur bar/ /ma 'ongs pa ru de ni yongs su smin par bya/ /sems ni rab tu skyo bas dam tshig nyams pa nyid/ /nyams pa'i dbang
9b7(rgyud 'grel): gis dmyal ba dag tu rab tu 'jug/ de bzhin bu'i chung ma bu mo sring mo dang/ /rgyug mo la sogs dang ni rigs ldan khyo med ma/ /mnyam pa'i bde ba'i don du blo rgyas slob ma yis/ /rim gyis de rnams yongs su sbyin par bya/ /dag cing bzhi ldan khyo med rnams dang rigs ldan
10a1(rgyud 'grel): ma/ /bla ma'i zhabs gnyis la ni ma lus dbul bya zhing/ /dbang bdun gyis ni mngon par dbang ni bskur rnams la/ /ji ltar rjes su mthun pa'i chags pa'i don du'o/ /de bzhin 'dir ni rigs ldan khyo med bsten bya ba/ /ji ltar chags paS mngal du 'dzin par mi 'gyur
10a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ mngal nas 'dod mi skye bo'i kha na ma thob/ /skye bo'i kha na ma thos 'jig rten pha rol nyams/ /chags pa 'dod cing gti mug dbang du gyur pa la/ /de phyir khyo med rigs ldan dag ni sbyin mi bya/ /khro ba'i sems dang bcas shing chang mi thun pa dang/ /dad tshul mi shes pa dang
10a3(rgyud 'grel): nor ni med pa la/ /nor gyis rnyed sla 'gag pa med pa'i smad 'tshod ma/ /bsod nams mang po'i rgyu ru de rnams sbyin par bya/ /rtag pa'i dngos grub rgyu ru yang dag gsan ba ni/ /slob dpon chen po'i go 'phang gnas la dbul bar bya/ /bza' bca' yon tan brgyad 'gyur mar
10a4(rgyud 'grel): mes 'bras bu ster/ /mar me brgyad 'gyur shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chang/ /chang gi brgyad 'gyur na chung ma la rab sbyor te/ /de phyir 'dod pa'i sbyin pa nges par khyad par 'phags/ /bza' bca' sha dang chang ldan phyag rgya bzang mo dang/ /dkon brnyed pa rtag par bla ma la dbul bya/ /mal
10a5(rgyud 'grel): stan dag dang na bza' dang ni byug pa dang/ /khyad par 'phags pa rang gi rje la dbul bar bya/ /dngos grub dag la chags pas bla ma'i spyan snga ru/ /blo gros rgyas pa rnams kyis ngan pa rang gi blang/ /rang gi khyim na bzhugs pa'i phyag rgya med pa na/ /rang gi phyag rgyal ni brten par mi
10a6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /shes rab dbang gis mngon par dbang ni bskur rnams la/ /dpal ldan ston pa ru ni yang dag gnas rnams kyis/ /chang rnams nges par shes rab rang bzhin yin pas na/ /shes rab rnam par dman pas 'dir ni btung mi bya/ /btung ba'i brtul zhugs don du dag rung ma dag
10a7(rgyud 'grel): rung/ rang gi 'khor lo la ni phyag rgya bzung bar 'gyur/ /rgyal ba mchog gis dbang bskur ting 'dzin don dag las/ /dbang gi don du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sems/ /yan lag dkar zhing bcu gnyis lo lon gzhon nu ma/ /de bzhin gshan dag skye bo'i lo ni nyi shu ma/ /dam
10b1(rgyud 'grel): tshig ldan zhing bum btsas pa bzung bya ste/ /dbang gi don du bla ma dag gis bka' stsal pa/ /sdang dang nad pa skal pa ngan dang mdul dang/ /khengs shing rdzas la bskam pa dang ni rtsod 'dod dang/ /bla mar mi gus gzan dag la ni sun 'don ma/ /'jigs pa ster pa mo de sbrul bzhin spang bar bya/ /ting 'dzin ? ru mnyam
10b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bde ba ster mdzad ma/ /dam tshig la zhugs rgan pa'i bud med mchog yin gyi/ /gang zhig sdug bsngal ster zhing mnyam pa'i bde 'joms ma/ /dam tshig rab dman bu mo gzhon nu ma nyid ma yin no/ /mkhris pa'i rims la khris pas zhi bar byed pa'o/ /rgun 'brum la sogs med pa'i sngon bu mchog
10b3(rgyud 'grel): yin gyi/ /rab tu zhi ba'i khros pa skyed pa byed pa'o/ /smin pa mngar ba dri zhim tal ma yin no/ /slob mas rang gi phyag rgya bla mar phul ba ni/ /de ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes su chags byas la/ /slar yang bla mas slob ma la ni de sbyin bya/ /gzhan dag du ni slob ma'i skye bos bsten bya min/ /gang yang slob
10b4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i yan lag bla mas ma gnang ba/ /rtag par slob ma rnams kyis spyi bos de la 'dud/ /rtag pa'i dngos grub 'dod pas bla ma'i bka' yis ni/ /mnyam pa'i bde ba ster mdzad bsten bya bsten mi bya/ /phyag rgya rab tu sbyor la rnam par bde bas ni/ /dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 'joms par byed
10b5(rgyud 'grel): pa thob 'gyur te/ /skye ba 'di ru rang gi lus kyi bdud 'joms par/ /'gyur ba de ni 'di ru shin tu ngo mtshar che/ /gang rnams drin gyis dngos grub bzang por 'gyur ba dang/ /gang rnams drin gyis yang dag rdzu 'phrul 'gyur ba dang/ /gang rnams drin gyis bde ba rab tu skyeba dang/ /gang rnams
10b6(rgyud 'grel): drin gyis srid ba'i me las grol bar 'gyur/ /phyag rgya de rnams kun la rab tu mang du mchod/ /phyag rgya de rnams kun ni mang du bsten par bya/ /phyag rgya de rnams kun la mang du tshim par bya/ /phyag rgya de rnams kun la mang du phyag bya zhing/ /phyag rgya de rnams kun ni rgyal ba'i yum yin te/
10b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya de rnams kun ni thub ba'i lcam mo yin/ /phyag rgya de rnams kun ni rgyal ba'i sras mo ste/ /phyag rgya de rnams kun ni rgyal ba'i tsha mo'o/ /phyag rgya de rnams kun ni bde gshegs thugs bsdud ma/ /phyag rgya de rnams kun ni bu rnams bde ster ma/ /phyag rgya de rnams kun ni dgra rnams 'jigs 
11a1(rgyud 'grel): ster ma/ /phyag rgya de rnams kun ni rgyal ba'i rdo rje'i khyim/ /phyag rgya de rnams kun la rang gi bla ma bas/ /lhag par mchod cing spyi bo yis ni phyag bya zhing/ /ji ltar rang gis nus pas 'od? gnas pa na/ /bu bzangs rnams kyis nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/ /'dod chags
11a2(rgyud 'grel): gang nyid kyis ni sems can ltung byed pa'i/ /de nyid kyis ni rnal 'byor pha rol 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig dug nyid kyis ni sems can 'chi byed de/ /dug sngags shes pas de nyid kyis ni nang 'joms byed/ /dpal ldan tshangs par spyod pa bud med la sbyor ba/ /bla na med pa'i rgyud las
11a3(rgyud 'grel): dor bar ma gsungs so/ /dug gi de nyid smra bas dug gi bzang po za/ /'on te ma zos na ni grags par mi 'gyur ro/ /gnyid log pa? dang sangs pa dug ni mi shes par/ /dper na bu yi lus la sbrul gyis mche ba btab/ /de bzhin du ni yid bzhin nor bu byang chub sems/ /de
11a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid med la bud med b+ha ga'i sbrul gyis btab/ /sngaD dbang po zos zer pa rnams la 'pho ba'i skad cig zhi byed min/ /skye ba du ma'i mdza' ru sdug bsngal ster ba'o/ /'chi med gdengs ka'i dug gi mche ba langs pa na/ /rab tu khros pas ji ltar zhi bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar rdo ba'i gos ni me
11a5(rgyud 'grel): yis gdungs pa na/ /zhu bar 'gyur gyi thal ba ru ni mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin chu skyes sbyor bas mchog gi byang chub sems/ /rtsol ldan rnams la 'di ni rang bzhin gyis dag 'gyur/ /me dang dngul chu dag ni rtag par dgra nyid do/ /me med pa yis kyang ni dul chu mi 'ching ste/ /'dul
11a6(rgyud 'grel): chub bcings pa yis khams rnams 'bigs mi 'gyur/ /khams rnams ma ? yis gser du 'gyur ba min/ /gser du ma gyur ba las rdzas ni mi 'phel lo/ /nor gyis rnam par dman bas yul gyi longs spyod med/ /longs spyod ma gtogs sdug bsngal rgyun mi
11a7(rgyud 'grel): 'chad pa ru/ /bcud len smra ba rnams kyi lus la 'gyur ba'o/ /bud med skye gnas dang sbyor ? ba med pa yis/ /de bzhin gnyis po yang ni dgra chen nyid yin no/ /sbyor ba ma gtogs g.yo ba'i sems ni mi 'ching ste/ /sems ma bcings pa yis ni lus la 'bigs? pa med/
11b1(rgyud 'grel): ma phug pa yis lus la dag pa'i spyod pa med/ /ma dag spyod pa yis ni bde ba mi ster ro/ /bde ba ma gtogs 'gro drug sdug bsngal mi bzad par/ /bag med pa yis sngags pa ngan pa rnams la 'gyur ba'o/ /bud med sbyor ba dman pas thar pa'i bde ba med/ /bud med sbyor ba dman kyang
11b2(rgyud 'grel): srid me'i sdug bsngal med/ /de bas rang gi blo yis legs par dpyad nas ni/ /sngags ba gang la mos pa yang ni blang bar bgyis/ /shing las me dang chu yang chu shel? dag las so/ /zho las mar dang rdo ba las ni lcags kyi rigs/ /bud med skye gnas sbyor las bde ba ma nyams par//
11b3(rgyud 'grel): skal ldan rnams kyis sbyor bas de ni blang bar gyis/ /rgyud kyi thog ma dbus mdza' la gnas 'dod pa ni/ /dge bar gsungs pa yin ni zhal nyid do/ /sbas pa'i yid bzhin nor bu brtag par dka' ba ni/ /bla ma dam pa slu ba po yis zin mi 'gyur rdo rje bslang bdag ni dang por gsungS
11b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ rdo rje me la srog zhugs pas ni gnyis pa'o/ /dpal ldan mi 'gyur byang chub sems ni gsum pa yin/ /'di dag nyid ni dge ba'i brtul zhugs chen po'o/ /'di ltar nyams pa'i bde ba dge ba ma yin zhing/ /'di ltar bstan bcos tshag ni dge ba ma yin no/ /'di ltar
11b5(rgyud 'grel): gtsug lag khang gnas dge ba ma yin te/ /'di ltar lus la sdug bsngal dge ba ma yin no/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i bde la rab tu chags pa rnams/ /gang zhig 'dod chags bral ba 'dir ni chags par 'gyur/ /'dod chags rab tu spangs pas de nas nges par ni/ /chags pa
11b6(rgyud 'grel): dang bral sbyor ba yang ni ring du 'gyur/ /thabs kyis lag tu yang ni rdo rje dril bu dang/ /ci phyir shes rab lag tu rdo rje 'di zhe na/ /bdud rnams gzhom pa'i phyir dang bde ba bsten phyir te/ /tshul khrims 'dzin pas mtshan ma shes par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po bcu bas lhag pa'i
11b7(rgyud 'grel): yon tan reg slong ste/ /dge slong bcu bas lhag pa'i yon tan bsngags pa bzang/ /dpal ldan tshangs par spyod dang ting nge 'dzin dang ni/ /byams pa la sogs dang ni de nyid nges pas so/ /dpag med bskal par theg pa ngan pa'i blo gros kyis/ /sbyin pa la sogs phyin zhing brtul
12a1(rgyud 'grel): zhugs spyad na yang/ /bde gshegs rab 'khrungs sa 'dir rgyal po dge slong dag/ gnas 'di la ni 'di ltar rab tu ma zhugs so/ /nyan thos theg pa nyid ni theg pa ma yin te/ /rang rgyal 'di ltar rgyal ba'i sa ni min par gsungs/ dpal ldan rdo rje'i theg pa rgyal ba'i
12a2(rgyud 'grel): theg pa nyid/ /de yang gnyis las theg pa bar dang tha mar byed/ /de phyir bla na med pa'i theg pa bor nas ni/ /'dod pa'i bla med byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /dper na bug bcas gru yis rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu/ /rin thang med pa'i nor bu'i phyir ni mi bgrod do/ /rang don la zhugs
12a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags kyis ni bag med pa/ /slob ma rang gi chung ma ji srid ma phul ba/ /de srid rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bla mas gsol lam mchi/ /rnam par nyams pa'i blo yis 'di dag mi shes so/ /rnon po yis ni gser dang shel gyi rin po che/ /smyug ma yis ni gor shi sha'i tsan dan te//
12a4(rgyud 'grel): phran tshegs rang gi chung ma yis ni sangs rgyas yum/ /de yis rab tu rnyed na 'di ru ci zhig skyon/ /lam bzangs btang nas dgon pa dag tu 'jug byed cing/ /bde ba bzang po btang nas sdug bsngal len par byed/ /e ma blo gros phyin ci log gi skye bo rnams/ /dbang po la
12a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs kyis kyang sten bar mi nus pa/ /dpag med bskal pa'i bar du mi 'gyur bde ba ni/ /bla ma dam pa bsten pa rnams kyis thob par 'gyur/ /yang na thob nas 'di ltar nyams par mi 'gyur te/ /nges par ma bsten lhag ma dang bcas rnam par nyams/ /sems kyi bag
12a6(rgyud 'grel): med dbang gis dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal te/ /sems kyi drin kyis kyang ni thar pa bde ba'o/ /rmi lam gzugs brnyan de ni su zhig gis byas te/ /bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal gang gi drin gyis thob/ /bdud ni rang gi sems te bdud gzhan yong ma yin/ /de bzhin gshegs
12a7(rgyud 'grel): pa de yang bde gshegs gzhan na med/ /bdud rnams bcom zhing rnam par rgyal ba'i thub pa ni/ /sems kyis sems dag so so ru ni zad pa nyid/ /sems la chung zad srid pa gang zhig len pa min/ /dor ba ma yin 'phel zhing 'grib pa yang ma yin/ /sems la sems
12b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid so sor snang ba tsam du ni/ /khams gsum pa ni dngos po stong bas gnas par 'gyur/ /ngo bo med pas stong par ngo bo nyid kyi stong/ /'khor ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas la rab tu zhugs/ /shes rab lus ldan snying rje dang ni tha mi dang/ /byang chub sems nyid de ni yongs su bsgom
12b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ shes rab yan lag bral zhing snying rjes tha dang na/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas la nam yang 'gro ba min/ /shes rab la zhugs snying rje rnam par spangs pa ni/ /rin chen sems ni rtag pa la ni rab mi gnas/ /shes rab rnam thar yin la thabs ni snying rje'o/ /de
12b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dbus su gnyis su med pa gsungs pa ste/ /rgyal ba'i bzhugs gnas bde ba dam pa dpag med pa/ /'khor ba las ni grol 'gyur smon lam tsam yin no/ /'jug pa'i sems dang smon pa yis ni sems nyid dang/ /dbye ba cung zhig dag ni de gnyis dag la yod
12b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro bar gnas pa dang ni 'gro ba nyid yin te/ /gang yang bye brag dag? ni sems kyi dbang nyid do/ /'khor ba'i bde ba smon pa yi ni sems yin te/ /dpag med bskal ba ru ni gzhan gyi don gyi phyir/ /ma nyams bde ba 'jug pa yi ni sems yin la/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i mthar thug de
12b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bdag gi don/ /dpag med rgyu ru dge slong gis ni gang zhig bsrungs/ /bde ba 'dod pa bde phyir gang zhig tshol bar byed/ /de gnyis dbus su gnyis med sbyor ba rin po che/ /gang zhig len pa de ni mi zad yang dag zhugs/ /sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis bsdus
12b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyud las gsungs pa'i/ /lag pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar mi bya zhes su grags/ /de nyid myang 'das 'bras bu rab tu ster mdzad ma/ /shes rab la sogs rgyud las rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs/ /'dod lus ma la chags par zhen pa 'dod can dang/ /dge slong sgyid lug can
12b7(rgyud 'grel): ni gtsug lag khang gnas pa/ /bde ba yi ni don du gang zhig las byed pa/ /de la rigs bas rgyal ba rnams kyi rdo rje'i tshig /skyon dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya de ni yongs spangs la/ /phyag rgya bzang mo bde ba'i don du bzung bar bya/ /de med na ni lag pa'i sbyor ba'i phyag rgya
13a1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ skye bo rnams la rang dbang yid bzhin nor bu mtshungs/ /gang zhig sems la rjes gnas mnyam pa'i bde ster dang/ /nyas skyon dang bral srid bsdug bsngal 'joms byed ma/ /du ma'i rnam pa'i yul gyis tha dad ma yin pa/ /de 'dir skye bo mkhas pas
13a2(rgyud 'grel): ci phyir 'dor bar byed/ /gang dag su zhig 'dod pa'i na chung bzang mo ni/ /dga' bas rgyal ba'i rdo rje mchad par ster byed ma/ /bde ba ma nyams de la byang chub bar du ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa du ma yang dag mchod par bya/ /phyogs gcig du ni dam tshig dag la rab zhugs ma/ /skal
13a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan bdag go zhes ni skul zhing smra byed de/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub rgyu ru rdo rje mchod mi byed/ /nyams pa'i sems de dmyal ba ru ni rab tu 'gro/ /lo ni bcu gnyis lon pa'i bu mo dkar mo nyid/ /shin tu rnam dag sems ldan slob mas rnyed nas ni/ /shin tu gus bas legs par mchod
13a4(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid byas la/ /bla med dbang phyir bla ma la ni dbul bar bya/ /ston pa de yis de dang lhan cig dbang ster te/ /slob ma la ni bla med byang chub rgyu du ste/ /shes rab dbang bskur bla ma'i zhal dang ldan pa yi/ /bzhi pa gzhan yang de dgyes pa yis ster ba mdzad/ /bla ma'i drin dag gis
13a5(rgyud 'grel): ni smig rgyu la sogs pa'i/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i lam la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur/ /yan lag drug gi sbyor bas rgyal dbang gzugs brnyan dang/ /phyag rgya rab tu sbyor bas rnam dag bde ba la/ /yan lag bzang mo chags pa la ni rab tu zhe na/ /gtso bo bsgrub par bya phyir de ni
13a6(rgyud 'grel): btsal bar bya/ /phyogs gcig gnas la rnam pa sna tshogs du ma yis/ /dngos grub ster ma de ni mang du mchod par bya/ /gtsang la rnam par dben pa'i sa yi phyogs dag dang/ /rgyal ba 'am ni zhi ba'i bde 'byung gnas dag tu/ /rtag par rgyal ba mchod phyir dri chen dri chu dang//
13a7(rgyud 'grel): chu la sogs pa rnams kyis byug pa byas nas ni/ /snying ga lte mgrin dpral ba spyi gtsug gsang ba la/ /rigs kyi lha mo rnams ni rab tu dgod par bya/ /de bzhin mig la sogs pa rigs ni drug pa ste/ /stong pa la sogs sa bon sna tshogs rim pas so/ /de bzhin mchod pa lnga
13b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs rnams kyis mchod byas la/ /de nas chu skyes su ni rdo rje rab tu gzhug/ yan lag drug gi sbyor bas smig rgyu la sogs pa/ /ye shes dag gis me ni rab tu bzhengs par bya/ /rim gyis rnal 'byor stobs kyis khyad par 'phags pa'i/ /rgyal ba nams ni shes rab me yis rab tu bsreg/ de rnams
13b2(rgyud 'grel): rab bsregs zla ba'i gzugs ni bzhu ba las/ /bdud rtsi dbang po gang 'dzag? de ni rdo rje can/ /de ni dbang gi dus su shin tu rnam dag zlos/ /thig le gsum gyi mdza' ru skad cig gcig la nyid/ /shes rab med kyang 'di ltar ri bong can bzhu las/ /gsum pa khyad par dga' ba'i mdza' ru kun
13b3(rgyud 'grel): nas btsal bar bya/ /'gro ba'i mgon gcig ston pa gzhan ni yod ma yin/ /khams gsum dag na bde ba khyad 'phags gzhan ni med/ /bde ba mnyam ster dngos grub gzhan ni yod ma yin/ /lus bsrung don du srung ba gzhan ni yod ma yin/ /'dir ni dkyil 'khor dag dang sku gzugs dkyil
13b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor med/ /lag pa'i phyag rgya bya ba dang ni gdan rnams med/ /sngags dang gtor ma sbyin sreg chog rab gnas dang/ /gshegs su gsol ba rnam pa'i chos la med/ /rang bzhin gyis dag 'gro ba yi ni rje dpon gcig/ shes rab me yis gal te rab tu bslangs pas na/ /ting 'dzin med zer snod?
13b5(rgyud 'grel): de yi phyi nas rang gi lus po la ni bdud stobs bzhi/ /de nyid gcig pu yis ni nyams par mdzad pa yin/ /ji srid de ma bzhengs par bde ba ster ba med/ /rab tu bzhengs pas 'dod chags bral nyid 'gyur ba yin/ /gnyis su med pa'i lam gcig 'di ni dka' ba ste/ /ma lus
13b6(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams ni lam gnyis dag pas 'gro/ /ma bsdams dbang gis brgya la zin par ma gyur na/ /chu skyes snying por dpal ldan byang chub sems lhung 'gyur/ /phyag rgya'i sems ni shin tu rnam dag shes byas nas/ /de nas chu skyes phyi rol
13b7(rgyud 'grel): rang gi khas bzung bya/ /mdog phyag rgya'i chu skyes la gnas rang gi sems/ /ma nyams rnams kyis mtshor ming ma chos su ? bzun? bya/ zhes snod med kyis bzung bya/ /myang ba'i don du rnam par nyams pa'i bdud rtsi gang/ /dpal ldan sngags pa rnams la 'chi ba nyams par byed/ /bud med skye gnas
14a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba'i dbang gis rang gi sems/ /gang zhig skyes bu rnams kyi 'gyur pa mi 'gyur la/ /rgyal bas mchod pa thugs rje che ldan re rnams kyi/ /zhabs gnyis dag la mgo bo yis ni phyag bgyi'o/ /na chung ma la sbyor
14a2(rgyud 'grel): bas dpal ldan byang chub sems/ /gang zhig bdag dang gzhan gyi don du bsrung mdzad cing/ /nyin dang mtshan du bdag dang gzhan gyi don mdzad pa'i/ /de rnams zhabs kyi pad+ma la ni phyag bgyi'o/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyi bde ba dpag
14a3(rgyud 'grel): med thob na yang/ /sems can rnams kyi don phyir 'dor bar mdzad gyur cing/ /'khor ba'i nang du rab tu 'jug pa'i dpa' bo ste/ /de rnams zhabs kyi pad+mar spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyin dang mtshan du bsam gtan stobs kyi
14a4(rgyud 'grel): rim pa yis/ /gang rnams rang gi sems ni rtsa dbus gnas par 'gyur/ /mdza' yis gzugs las shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sku/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi rdo rje rtse gcig pa'o/ /thad pa'i bde rgyu dang po yis ni sangs rgyas la//
14a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med de ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal nyid do/ /mnga' bdag du ki 'khor lo khams gsum la gnas pa/ /mi 'gyur thig le sbyor bas yang dag thob par 'gyur/ /ji ltar gzhon nu ma'i me long nang du ni/ /ma mthong mthong
14a6(rgyud 'grel): lta'i pra ti se na'i don lta byed/ /de bzhin 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar byung ba ni/ /de nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor pa yis nam khar mthong/ /mngon sum dag tu gzugs ni dngos po stong pa'i phyir/ /dngos po dang ni dngos med de ru med pa
14a7(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /sgyu ma rang ni rmi lam rdzu 'phrul mtshungs pa ni/ /de la 'bras bu yod cing dngos po med pa'o/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu rjes su mtshungs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ /ma skyes chos rnams la ni skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /rnam pa kun ldan kun
14b1(rgyud 'grel): nas rnam par dag pa dang/ /dbang po thams cad dang ldan kun gyi snying khar gnas/ /ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing dag gis/ /sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis kun nas 'dod rdzogs byed/ /de bzhin bsam pa'i dbang gis
14b2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa de nyid ni/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos las skye ba 'gyur/ /stong pa yis ni rgyu las gsal bar rgyu yis ni/ /rang gi stong pa la ni nges par rgyas gdab ste/ /phyi dang lus po dag dang gzhan rnams gcig tu ste/ /lta ba drug
14b3(rgyud 'grel): la gnas dang gzhan rnams slu bar byed/ /mi 'gyur lam nyams rang gi don la gnas pa yi/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis de nyid du ma'i gzhung gis brtags/ /tshangs pa'am ni seng ge mchog gi dbang phyug gam/ /de bzhin byed po yis
14b4(rgyud 'grel): ni chos ni gang smras pa/ /rig byed mdza' dag grub mdza' i gzhung dang nges tshig gi /mdor bsdus de nyid 'di ru rnam par dpyad par bgyi/ /gal te skye dgu rnams la skyed byed gcig nyid 'dir/ /ji ltar rigs dag 'di ni rnam pa bzhi ru 'gyur//
14b5(rgyud 'grel): tshad ma dang ni dpe dang tshul gyi dbye ba yis/ /yongs su brtags na rnam par mthun par mi 'gyuro/ /pha gcig dag la nges par bu ni bzhir gyur na/ /bu de rnams la nges par rigs ni gcig yin no/ /de ltar mchog tu 'dod las skyes pa'i
14b6(rgyud 'grel): mi rnams kyi/ /rigs kyi rnam pa bzhi ru rigs pa yod pa ma yin/ /ji ltar u dum ba ra'i shing las skyes pa'i 'bras bu ni/ /rtsa ba dbus dang rtse mo las byung gang zhig rnams/ /gzugs dang rnam par reg bya ro rnams 'dra ba ste/ /de bzhin kha nyid
14b7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs gnas ni gcig tu 'gyur/ /kha las skyes pa ri 'ong 'od zer dkar ma yin/ /dpung pa las skyes nyid byed shar dang 'dra ba min/ /brla nas skyes pa ldong ros kha dog dang 'dra min/ /rkang pa las skyes mig sman chen po gnag
15a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dra min/ /gnyis skyes thams cad ye shes rigs min rgyal rigs ni/ /rgyal po'i rigs las skyes pas dpa' bo rnams ma yin/ /rje'u rigs thams cad phun sum tshogs dang ldan pa yin/ /'jig
15a2(rgyud 'grel): rten du ni dmangs rigs las chen mi byed do/ /khams kyi dbye bas bde dang sdug bsngal dngos po dang/ /lung dang rigs pas bsod nams tshogs dang sdig pa dang/ /skye dang 'jig rten mnyam pa nyams su myong ba ste/ /mi
15a3(rgyud 'grel): rigs rnam pa bzhi ni de ltar 'gyur ba'o/ /rdzogs ldan dus su rigs kyi dbye ba yod ma yin/ /sum ldan 'jug pa gtso bo dang ni 'khor 'gyur ro/ /dus gnyis la ni dngos po nyams par mi 'gyur te/ /gang zhig gnyis ldan
15a4(rgyud 'grel): dus su rigs dang rigs min nyid/ /de dang ser sna rgyu dang dregs pa nga rgyal dang/ /chags pa zhe sdang gis ni rigs ni ldog par 'gyur/ /rigs rnams byas nas rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur ba ste/ /gzhan ni rigs dang rigs
15a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung kha dog med/ /byed pa po yi rang lus rim pa ji lta ba/ /kha nyid dang ni dpung pa brla dang rkang pa las/ /bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u dmangs rigs skyes gyur na/ /phyugs dang tha ma las skyes de'i gang nas byung/ /tshangs
15a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i kha nyid las skyes bram ze grags pa na/ /bram ze mo yang gnas de nyid las yin nam ci/ /gal te 'di dag skye gnas gcig las skyes gyur na/ /ming po dang ni srid mo bag mar rigs ma yin/ /gal te yin na
15a7(rgyud 'grel): kla klo'i skye bo 'jug par 'gyur/ /kla klo 'jug par gyur na rigs ni nyams pas te/ /rigs zad na ni dmyal bar sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ /rang gi rigs ni 'dzin phyir de dag la 'gyur ro/ /de ltar dpung brla rkang pa las
15b1(rgyud 'grel): byung? rnams la ni/ /gang zhig rang gi rigs ni 'dzin phyir ldog par 'gyur/ /de phyir drang srong rigs ni bag ma'i dus dag tu/ /'jig rten pha rol 'jigs pas rtag par byed pa'o/ /dum sna tshogs rigs dang rnam par stong phrag pa/ /bag ma
15b2(rgyud 'grel): len pa'i dus su rnam par brtag par byed/ /gang phyir drang srong rigs ni brtag par byed par 'gyur/ /de phyir mchod 'dod lus las rigs ni ma yin no/ /ye shes kyis ni rigs dang rdzu 'phrul grub pa dang/ /de bzhin khyad par dbang
15b3(rgyud 'grel): phyug nyid du 'gyur ba ste/ /de phyir ye shes che 'di rnam par dag pa yin/ /gzhan du na ni rang gi rigs 'gyur min/ /tshangs min skye ba'i gnas ni drang srong rgyas sogs pa/ /skye gnas bram ze'i go 'phang rab tu zhugs par
15b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /de phyir dka' thub bzang po dor nas rigs kyis ni/ /rnam par dag pa'i lam ni ster bar mi 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma dang ni rin po che dang mu tig dang/ /'dab dang ri bo dang ni thod pa'i sbyor las 'byung/ /de nyid rnams ni ma lus 'jig
15b5(rgyud 'grel): rten mchod gnas 'gyur/ /de rnams sngon gyi skye gnas las ni ma yin no/ /kha las chos ni ston par byed cing sgrogs byed pas/ /de phyir bram ze rnams ni kha las skye bar 'gyur/ /rgyal rigs rnams ni dpung pas 'khrug par byed pa ste//
15b6(rgyud 'grel): dpung pa da dag las ni de rnams skye bar 'gyur/ /brla yi stobs kyis rje rigs skye bo 'gron por byed/ /de phyir de rnams de las skyes par gyur pa'o/ /rkang pa'i rtsa bar brten par byed par grags pa yis/ /de phyir rkang pa las ni dmangs rigs skye
15b7(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /de phyir gzhan rnams rigs kyi dbye ba bco brgyad yin/ /rang gi las kyi rang bzhin las kyi ngo bor skyes/ /'jig rten gsum du las kyi mthu ni stobs dang ldan/ /gang phyir bram ze yang ni dmangs rigs nyid du 'gyur/ /sgog skye 
16a1(rgyud 'grel): dag dang btsod dang bza' min zos pa dang/ /chad 'thungs nas ni dmangs rigs gnas su 'gyur ba ste/ /dka' thub byas nas slar yang bram ze de nyid du/ /'gyur de de phyir dka' thub khyad par can yin no/ /grog
16a2(rgyud 'grel): ma dang ni ra ri dwags dang sna mtshan dang/ /rgyas pa la sogs drang srong gzhan rnams rab grags pa/ /tshangs pa'i skye gnas min las kyang ni de rnams skyes/ /dka' thub khyad par dag gi drang srong rnams su 'gyur/ /de phyir rang gi
16a3(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi dag dang ma dag pa/ /don dam pa yis rgyu yis gang yang med par 'gyur/ /zhe sdang dbang gis rigs 'di rab tu 'byung ba ste/ /rang don 'dod pa'i bram zes nor gyi don du byas/ /dag pa'i bram ze mo gang bdag po'i brtul
16a4(rgyud 'grel): zhugs can/ /skyes bu gzhan ma la ni de yis bsten par byed/ /de yi bu ni 'di ru bram zer gyur pa ste/ /de phyir rigs ni ji ltar rim pas ma yin no/ /lus 'di'i snga ma'i rigs kyi thal ba gzhan yin la/ /las kyi dbang las
16a5(rgyud 'grel): pha yi srog kyang gzhan yin te/ /gzhan du lus dang srog ngag gi ni rigs dag kyang/ /bu dang bcas pa su zhig gis ni 'byin par byed/ /gzhan du rigs kyang gal te pha yis yin na ni/ /pha yi pha gang de ni mes bo'i
16a6(rgyud 'grel): yin par 'gyur/ /de ltar 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad rang gi rigs/ /gnyis skyes rnams la drang srod rigs gzhan yod ma yin/ /sngon pa bdun yang ri dags dag dang dur pa dang/ /rang? ba de rnams gnyis skyes su yang
16a7(rgyud 'grel): slar byung 'gyur/ /gang phyir skye ba gzhan du srog ni las dbang gis/ /yin pa de phyir nang na drang srong rigs med do/ /gnyis skyes tshim na nam mkha' dang ni sa yi gnas/ /gang yin der ni shi ba chim par mngon par 'dod//
16b1(rgyud 'grel): ? pa dag kyang ma zhu'i dbang las bag med pa/ /pha yi bag med du 'gyur 'di ni ngo mtshar ro/ /gal te gnyis skyes dang ni pho rog gis zan zos/ /shi ba'i pha ni pha rol du ni tshim par byed/ /dge ba dang ni mi dge ba mi rgyu//
16b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan des/ /pha de nyid kyi sngon du bsags pa nyams par 'gyur/ /rang gis byin pa rang nyid kyis ni thob 'gyur te/ /gzhan ma rnams kyi sbyin pa bsngos pa'i blo yis min/ /bde bar gshegs pas rang gi don du rang sha ni/
16b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin min? de bzhin du yang de rnams des grol phyir/ /thams cad mkhyen pa rnams kyis gzhung kun rnams las ni/ /srog gcod kyis mgrol ba yod pha ma yin no/ /mchod sbyin la ni srog bcad de bzhin smra byed pa/ /e
16b4(rgyud 'grel): ma gnyis skyes rnams kyis mi shes gnas yin no/ /mchod sbyin la ni bsad cing bsod pa gang yang med/ /'jig rten bsad bya lha ru nges par 'gro med de/ /snying rje dang ni nges par zhi ba dang bral ba'i/ /gnyis skyes skyon can
16b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi tshig 'di yin par 'gyur/ /dbul po'i sdug bsngal dang ni 'dod pa dang bral nas/ /rang gi rtsa lag grogs po yid 'ong bu dang tsha?/ /de rnams bde bar 'dod dang bde 'gro 'dod pa na/ /gal te tshig 'di bde na yin de
16b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams sreg par byed/ /bu dang rtsa lag stobs med la sogs shi gyur na/ /du 'bod nas ni dur khrod dag tu phyin pa dang/ /shi ba rnams la gang gi chu dang zan sbyin no/ /rmongs pa de yis ji ltar ma skyes la sogs bsod/
16b7(rgyud 'grel): a shwa ta tha la brten dang til snod sbyin pa dang/ /ba la reg pa dang ni bram ze tshim pa dang/ /gang gA'i chu dang b+ha ra ta ni thos pa ste/ /'di rnams kyis ni gal te sdig nyams byed 'gyur na/ /mkha' 'gro yis ni a shwata tha
17a1(rgyud 'grel): la brten par byed/ /til mkhan gyis ni til gyi snod ni sbyin pa ste/ /bskyob be'u? yis pa la reg par byed pa dang/ /mkhas min dag kyang gnyis skyes rnams la ston mo ste/ /gang+gA'i chu ni rus sbal dang ni nya yis 'thungs/ /ma skyes
17a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yis b+ha ra ta yis grags pa thos/ /de rnams la ni sngon bsags las kyi 'bras bu med/ /dran pa'i tshad ma yis ni dka' thub nyams 'gyur min/ /a shwat tha la brten dang til snod sbyin pa gang/ /ba la reg dang gnyis skyes tshim pa ci yin dang
17a3(rgyud 'grel): gang ga'i chu dang b+ha ra ta ni thos pa ci/ /lam ni nyams par gyur pas 'di nyid mi shes so/ /yon tan 'phel ba yul gyis rgyas par 'gyur ba yis/ /gang la steng dang 'og tu lcug ma rgyas par 'gyur/ /mi'i 'jig rten du ni las kyis bcings pa yi//
17a4(rgyud 'grel): 'og tu rtsa ba rnams ni tshugs par ba ste/ /de bzhin gzugs med gang la nye bar thob pa med/ /thog ma med la tha ma med cing bar gnas med/ /a shwata tha shing de la nges par brten pa ni/ /klu don 'bras bu las ni rgyas par bshad pa'o/ /til ni
17a5(rgyud 'grel): sems can yin zhing snod nyid snod yin te/ /shing rnams rab tu sbyin pa til snod sbyin pa'o/ /ba ni lha yi mig yin reg pa snang ba ste/ /ba la reg pa nyid du nges par brjod par 'gyur/ /gnyis skyes me ste srog chags tshogs kyi lus la ni/ /tshim par
17a6(rgyud 'grel): byed pa de ni gnyis skyes tshim pa'o/ /gang+gA'i chu nyid zla ba'i bdud rtsi btung ba ste/ /ser sna zad pa b+ha ra ta ni thos pa'o/ /phyi ma'i tshe yi rgyu ru sgra mkhan gyis kyang ni/ /rig byed ma lus yi ge kha ton? byed par 'gyur/ /dran pa dang ni rig byed gzhung gi sna tshogs pa//
17a7(rgyud 'grel): mi shes dbang gis 'bras med mgrin bskams par byed/ /rig byed tshad ma dang ni dran pa tshad ma ste/ /'di nyid tshig ni shin tu 'gal ba'i phyogs yin no/ /dam pa'i chos las gsungs pa'i tshig ni tshad ma ste/ /rgyal ba'i gsud ni 'di nyid rnam par dag pa'o/
17b1(rgyud 'grel): nub phyogs sin d+hu'i yul du gnyis skyes rnams kyis ni/ /thod pa can dang dmangs rigs dag gi zan za? ru/ /ri bcas yul du ba lang sha dang ma he dang/ /de bzhin du yang chad ni gtsang mar bstan pa yin/ /gau ta ma la sogs yul dum he'i sha gtsang bar//
17b2(rgyud 'grel): mkhal sogs yul du rta sha la sogs bstan/ /an tral sogs dang ni ma kha sogs yul du/ /ma he sha dang phag sha bza' bar mi rung ngo/ /mgul kha la sogs yul du ma sogs bzung ba ni?/ khul? sogs pa rnams la gtsang mar bshad pa yin/ /gang
17b3(rgyud 'grel): gis yul de dag tu 'dod pa'i dngos grub ni/ /de nyid byas na mi rnams la ni skyon med do/ /gal te gnyis skyes rnams ni dran pa'i tshig ngag gis/ /ltung 'gyur de lta na ni de rnams rang yul du/ /dran tshig skyon gyis char than du ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /de ltar
17b4(rgyud 'grel): de ru gnyis skyes tshe la dran pa ni/ /yul gyi tha snyad kyis ni tshad ma ma yin no/ /thub pa rnams kyis lo rgyus chos kyang gang bstan pa/ /de ni bden nam brdzun pa rnam par dpyad par bgyi/ /rab brtan dag dang sa bsrungs dang ni g.yud drung dang/ /me tog sogs
17b5(rgyud 'grel): dang lha mo dang ni dpal mo dang/ /zla ba bdud rtsi 'o ma'i rgya mtsho srubs pa las/ /'di rnams 'byung zhes lo rgyus kyis tshig yin no/ /gal te stobs ldan rgyal srid du ni zla ba 'di/ /byung na long ba'i 'thab mo'i dus su yod ma yin/ /zla ba med nas gzhi la ni
17b6(rgyud 'grel): zla tshes dang/ /tshes la zla ba'i cha lnga ji ltar yin te 'dir/ /sngon du zla dang ral pa 'dzin pa'i dbang phyug gis/ /zla ba la ni zhen pas long ba bsad pa yin/ /phyi nas dus kyi dbang gis stobs ldan bskyed pa ste/ /de nas lha dbang rnams kyis rgya mtsho srubs pa
17b7(rgyud 'grel): yin/ gal te brdzun gyi lo rgyus kyi ni tshig rnams kyis/ /chos rgyur de lta na ni bden tshig ci zhig bya/ /srog gcod mthu yis gal te mtho res 'gyur na ni/ /gzhan la phan pas de ltar dmyal bar 'gyur ba yis/ /lo rgyus chos rnams dang ni dran pa mkhas rnams
18a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /rnam par dpyad par byas nas brdzun du gyur pa ste/ /de phyir chos de mi shes byis pa bram zes byas/ /rang gi phyis bzhin du rnam par mi dpyad do/ /gal te rig byed 'di ni mkha' bzhin ma byas pa/ /ji ltar 'di ni kha las 'don par byed pa
18a2(rgyud 'grel): yin/ nor dang chags pa zhen pa'i bram ze rnams kyis ni/ /mgrin pa chu dang rkan sogs kyis ni nan tan byed/ /gal te rig byed snga ma yin na yul skad med/ /sngon du yul skad yin na rig byed thog mar med/ /gal te rang 'byung yin na kha las ma skyes
18a3(rgyud 'grel): te/ gal te thams cad khyab na kun gyis 'don par 'gyur/ /an d+ha'i shing dang sna tshogs 'bru dang mar dang zan/ /bde ba'i don du 'bar ba'i thab du sreg par byed/ /sha za ba'i me ni shin tu skrag par byed/ /me lha 'di dag la sogs mi 'dod tshig
18a4(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /bud med pas ni mtho ris gnas su mi 'gro na/ /'jig rten grags pa'i tshad ma gal te 'dir 'gyur te/ /ne rtsol sogs gzhan yang gzhon nu'i dus su ni/ /dka' thub byas nas tshangs pa'i gnas su zhugs par gyur/ /rigs byed las ni gzhan
18a5(rgyud 'grel): bshad dran pa'i tshig ni gzhan/ /rnal 'byor rig pa yis ni gcig nyid mi 'gyur ro/ /rig byed tshig ni rnal 'byor bgyis bsten thar pa ste/ /'khor ba'i 'bras bu nges par dran pas ster ba ni/ /'khor bas bcings pa'i 'khyam par 'jug par gyur
18a6(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ /de phyir dran pa'i sems ni 'di nyid 'dod ma yin/ /sdug bsngal 'phrog byed thar pa'i go 'phang zhugs par 'gyur/ /ye shes bdud rtsi dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal 'dod do/ /de ltar dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal dman blo ngan ni/ /gnyis skyes rnams
18a7(rgyud 'grel): la kun nas lam ni nyams par 'gyur/ /mi shes pa yi dbang gis srog bcod byas nas ni/ /rang rig nga rgyal dbang gis dmyal bar zhugs par 'gyur/ /tshangs pa dang ni dbang phyug khyab 'jug gzugs gcig 'dir/ /drag pos ci phyir na
18b1(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa'i mgo bo gcod/ /gal te drag po sdig med 'jig rten grags pas na/ /ci phyir thod pa bor nas de ni dag par 'gyur/ /drag po phyag dang 'di ni gtsang ma ma yin la/ /gal te bsod nams rgyu du rig par mi byed cing/ /de nyid spyi bo nas ni lhung 'gyur gtsang ba na//
18b2(rgyud 'grel): gang+gA'i chu yis ci yi phyir na khrus 'di byed/ /yan lag sna tshogs pa ni khrus la sbyar ba yis/ /nam mkha' las ni 'gro bas la ltung bar 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i rgyu du gang+gA'i chu la gang zhugs pa/ /rmongs pa de ni de du 'gro ba gang na rigs/ /khyab 'jug lus la
18b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal mo rang dbang gal te 'gyur/ /rA mas ci phyir de ru sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur/ /kun mkhyen khyab 'jug gal te 'jig rten grags pa na/ /bud med bral ba'i dbang gis ci phyir phyugs rnams 'gro/ /gang gis sa la rkang pa gsum du byas pa na/ /tshul de
18b4(rgyud 'grel): yis ci phyir zam pa bcing bar byed/ /gang gi lte ba na gnas ma lus srid gsum na/ /de yi rang gi chung ma ci'i phyir 'phrog par 'gyur/ /'di dag la sogs du ma rnam pa stong phrag gis/ /tshig rnams kyis ni mi rnams sdug bsngal ster bar byed/ /rnam par
18b5(rgyud 'grel): dpyang na don ? med par gyur pa'o/ /gnyis skyes rigs kyi nga rgyal dbang gis yang dag bstan/ /dang po phas ni rab tu skye bar byed pa dang/ /phyi nas mas ni mngal gyi dbang gis grags par 'gyur/ /de ltar mngal nas skyes pa'i nges pas gnyis skyes 'gyur/ /gzhan
18b6(rgyud 'grel): du na ni dmangs rigs dbang gis mi ma yin// mngal nas skyes pas byis pa dang ni ltan cig tu/ /mngal gyi nang nas tshangs pa'i skud pa byung ba min/ /de rnams la ni chog 'di nyid byas nas su/ /gnyis skyes ming gi rgyu ru mgrin par rab tu min/ /gnyis skyes nyid gcig
18b7(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin can/ /cho ga byas ba'i skud pas gzhan mar gyur pa ni/ /gnyis skyes ma lus rnams la co 'dra'i don du ste/ /rmongs pa'i bsam pa sna tshogs em ngo mtshar che/ /khyab 'jug de nyid blo yis rab tu 'jug pa gzhan/ /shing las skyes pa'i
19a1(rgyud 'grel): dbyug pa 'dzin par byed ba yis/ /dgun la sogs pa'i dus kyi mtshan mo'i mdza' du ni/ /'dar ba dang ldan chu yis khrus ni byed pa ste/ /grang bas 'dzin dang rab tu 'dar ba'i lus la ni/ /bsam gtan dang ni sngags bzlas bzang po de ru gang/ /dper na gdug
19a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sprul ni khyim du zhugs pa yi/ /mun pas bkab pa de ru bsam pa med pa ltar/ /lus dang ngag dang sems ni dbyug pa gsum yin te/ /sems ni 'dus par bya ba dbyug pa gcig yin no/ /dpal ldan tshangs ba'i gzugs ni mdza' med gcig pu ste/ /tshul
19a3(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pa'i dbyug pa can gyis mi 'dzin no/ /zhib bas kyang thal bas lus po byug bar byed/ /khrus kyi mdza' rus gnyis dbang po blo yin te/ /bde ba'i don du ral pa'i khu tshur rtag tu 'dzin/ /'dod pa'i me tog rnams kyis rdo nyid mchod par byed/ /gzhan ma
19a4(rgyud 'grel): thod pa rnams dang mgo bo 'dzin pa dang/ /lus la mi'i dus pas rgyan rnams byed pa ste/ /dpal ldan dngos grub rgyu du dur khrod 'khor bar byed/ /mi shes dbang gis blo ngan la ni 'grub pa gang/ /gdong nag dang ni de bzhin phyugS bdag gzhan ma yin/ /gcer bu
19a5(rgyud 'grel): dang ni ral ba ring po skra bregs pa/ /slob pa 'khor nas zhi bar rab tu 'gro bar 'dod/ /thar pa'i go 'phang grub nas 'gro bar 'gyur min no/ /gzhan ma rnams kyang gcer bu dang ni skra byung dang/ /gso dang bcas pa yan lag thams cad dri mas byugs/ /bkres dang skom pas
19a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa blo ngan 'chi bar 'gyur/ /thar pa'i lam las nam yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gzhan ma rnams kyis dbyar gyi dus su shing drung pa/ /sos ka dang ni dpyid kyi dus su tshad pa can/ /dgun gyi dus su bla gab med pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /don dam pa'i rgyu du sdug bsngal chen po
19a7(rgyud 'grel): byed/ gcer bu pa la kun nas seng+ge'i khri dang ni/ /mgo bo'i skra rnams phyung ba la ni gdugs gsum dang/ /dri mas byug la sngon du mya ngan med shing las/ /lha yi me tog 'bab pa rigs pa ma yin no/ /gzhan ma yang ni mgo spu bregs pa'i dge slong nyid/ /dur?
19b1(rgyud 'grel): smrig? 'dzin cing 'dod pa'i lha khang gnas par byed/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis dman pa nor ni sogs bar 'dod/ /tal steng nas ? bzhin zad bar 'gyur ba'o/ /gzhan ma rnams kyang rigs kyi gnas su rab zhugs nas/ /bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa mang po za bar byed/ /snying rje
19b2(rgyud 'grel): rang bral mnyam pa'i bde bas dman pa dang/ /'jig rten 'gal ba rnams la yang dag spyod par byed/ /skye ba bdun pa'i mi ni nges par phyugs yin te/ /de'i bdud rtsis mi la dngos grub myur bar ster/ /rigs kyi lung las rul pa'i dri ni gtsang ba ste/ /'jigs
19b3(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa rnams la bstan par mi bya'o/ /gzhan yang zhi ba'i rgyu ru rnam pa sna tshogs pas/ /dgod ba dang bcas rnal 'byor 'dzin par byed pa ste/ /rab mchog yan lag dang ldan rnams la zhe sdang dang/ /chags pa dang ldan rgyu ru dpal ldan tshangs spyod
19b4(rgyud 'grel): byed/ ? lam du yang gang zhig bud med sbyor la zhen/ /dpal ldan tshangs pa'i dka' thub can de jiltar na/ /dper na mar gyi gong bu 'bar ba'i me yis ni/ /skad cig tsam gyis zhu ba nyid du 'gyur bzhin no/ /de ltar bla ma dam pa'i zhal dang dman glen pa
19b5(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /sdug bsngal mang po ster ba'i lam ni 'dzin par byed/ /bde ba'i rgyu ru? yang ni bsod nams kyis dman pa/ /dmyal ba rnams kyi me la nyal sa tshol bar byed/ /rang gi sems la sdug bsngal 'di ni 'phel 'gyur na/ /skye ba du ma rgya yis bde ba ster mi
19b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /zhing rnams la ni ji tsho'i sa bon btab pa las/ /sa lu'i sa bon khyad par can du mi 'gyur ro/ /tshangs ba'i shing las chu shing 'bras bu 'gyur pa min/ /ma ya las ni bu ram shing dang chu las mar nyid min/ /dug las bcud len khyad par can du
19b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba med/ /rang gi sems las sdug bsngal las ni bde 'gyur min/ /sems las sdug bsngal sa bon yang dag btab pa na/ /skye ba du ma rnams la 'phel bar 'gyur ba yis/ /de phyir rnam dag rnams kyis rnam par dpyad nas ni/ /mnyam pa'i bde ba nyams
20a1(rgyud 'grel): pa yongs su dor bya zhing/ /srog nyid shi nas phyi nas skye ba med pa ni/ /rigs can gzhan rnams nyams par gyur pas ston byed cing/ /gal te de ltar yin na ci phyir drag po yis/ /'chi bar gyur pa rnams kyis zhi gnas 'jug gang byed/ /gzhan rnams gyis kyang mtho ? bde
20a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rgyu ru ni/ rang gi ling ga'i rtse mo'i lag pa gcod par byed/ /nyin mo'i mdza' dang mtshan mo'i steng du bza' ba ni/ /nges par stag gzir rnams kyis byed par 'gyur pa'o/ /rang gi las kyis shi bar gyur ba'i phyugs rnams kyis/ /de yi shin nye bar spyod ? mi
20a3(rgyud 'grel): byed do/ /srog bcad rab tu byas nas de nyid za byed de/ /gzhan dun ni mi rnams tho ris 'gro ba med/ /'di la sogs pa 'gal ba dum ? stegs? pa/ /ngan pa rnams kyi sems la sdug bsngal shing rnams kyi/ /rtsa ba bskal pa du ma rnams su bcings pa
20a4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang dbyung bar nus pa ma yin no/ /thog med gtso bo yon tan bdag nyid rang bzhin dang/ /nga rgyal dang ni blo gros yid bcas 'byung ba dang/ /las kyi dbang yod na ni dpal ldan yul dbang po/ /'di dag gzhan ma rnams kyis yongs su
20a5(rgyud 'grel): brtag par byed/ /lta ba rnams la brten pa'i du ma'i gzhung rnams dang/ /ming gi rab tu dbye bas mkhas pa mang rnams kyis/ /gang zhig rig byed mdza' dang grub mdza' gzhan rnams ni/ /nor 'dod rgyu ru de nyid rnams ni brjod par byed/ /oM b+hur b+hu wa:swa
20a6(rgyud 'grel): ni 'di ru gang yin dang/ /sa we tor ba re N+ye dang b+ha ra go de ba dang/ /swa d+hi ma hi gang yin d+he ya yon dang/ /pra tso ta ya gang yin nges par rig byed tshig /oM yig sngags ni mchog tu lha yi me yin te/ /b+hu ni nges par sa yig b+ha wa 'jig rten gsum/ /sa yig thar pa
20a7(rgyud 'grel): yin te sa ni drag po yin/ /wo te zhes ni tshangs pa wa re N+ya ni lha min dgra/ /b+ha? go zhes ni chu yin de ba 'dir ni dbang por brjod/ /swa d+hi zhes ni bdag yin ma hi srog gi rlung/ /d+he ya zhes ni de bzhin bdag gi go 'phang brjod/ /yon zhes ni rtag par rgyu ba chen po'o/ /bra
20b1(rgyud 'grel): tso ta ya zhes ni de nyid rab tu bskul/ /be ti? ni nyams pas 'jig rten pha rol 'gyur/ /ga ya tri ni mnyams srid pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de ltar phyir gyur nang gi gnas su de bzhin no/ /a po 'dod pa chen po srid las 'byung gnas ston/ /'di dag la sogs pa yis nang gi thun
20b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshams 'gyur/ /zla dang nyi ma'i dbus su nyin dang mtshan mo ni/ /sbog? dang thur sel la gnas dbus su yin pa ste/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'phrog byed dag pa'i thun mtshams ste/ /nyi ma nub dang de bzhin shar las gzhan ma yin/ /phyi rol glen pa rnams la gsang
20b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don du ni/ /sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis mes pos bshad pa'o/ /oM yig sa bon zhes ni nges par sku rdo rje/ /b+hu ni gsung gis rang bzhin b+ha ba thugs nyid do/ /don dam pa'i rgyu phyir sa yig ye shes te/ /'jig rten gsum po de nyid thub pa bzang po'i gzhung//
20b4(rgyud 'grel): drag po snang ba mdza' yas mes pos bshad pa'o/ /oM yig sa bon zhes ni nges par sku rdo rje/ /b+hu ni gsung gis rang bzhin b+ha ba thugs nyid do/ /don dam pa'i rgyu phyir sa yig ye shes te/ /'jig rten gsum po de nyid thub pa bzang po'i gzhud//
20b5(rgyud 'grel): tu grags/ /de bzhin d+he ya zhes ni mchog tu mA ma kI/ /yon zhes ni rgyal ba rnams kyi sgrol mar gsungs/ /pra tso da ya? zhes ni pha rol phyin par grags/ /a po 'dod chen zhes ni 'gro ba'i thabs yin no/ /de dag snyoms par zhugs pa thun mtshams tha dad min/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i
20b6(rgyud 'grel): dbus su so sor phyag 'tshal 'gyur/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas shes ni 'o ma'i rgya mtshor gsungs de yid dbus su pad+ma chu skyes de nyid do/ /gang zhig zla ba'i gdan ni gnam ldid? de nyid do/ /gang zhig thugs kyi rdo rje khyab 'jug de nyid do/ /yang dag dgug pa rgyal ka ga te
20b7(rgyud 'grel): mug rdo rje ste/ /so sor snang ba dag pa 'dod chags rdo rje'i/ s/gang zhig mi 'dus zhes ni nga rgyal rdo rje ste/ /mi 'gags chen po zhes ni phrag dog rdo rje/ /grags ma zhes ni rlung yin 'bar ma dpal mo ste/ /rgyal mchu yin rnam par rgyal ma 'dzin pa'o/ /mdza' med dpal mo 
21a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes ni rdo rje dbyings mchog yin/ /yan lag drug bre ? ni dbang po rnams la dgod/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas la gnas pad+ma'i dbus su ste/ /gang zhig zla ba'i gdan ni khyu mchog de nyid do/ /dbang phyug gdong ba lnga ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /chu skyes lta bar ni
21a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dag gnas pa'o/ /chos dang de bzhin 'dod ma ye shes gsum pa ste/ /chags pa dang bral dbang phyug nyid ni 'di ltar lnga/ /dbus dang mtshams rnams dag la stong pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /gzhan dag gnas shing ge sar rtse mor gzhan ma'o/ /g.yo ba mo dang phra mo gzhan
21a3(rgyud 'grel): yang drag mo dang/ /dge ma la sogs gzhan ma bde 'byung nus pa gang/ /du ba la sogs ma lus pha rol phyin pa ste/ /de bzhin gzhan ni pad+ma'i 'dab dang dbus su'o/ /dbus su dbang phyug che dang shar du skyes bu ste/ /g.yas su zad min ma dang gnod sbyin nyid ni g.yon du'o//
21a4(rgyud 'grel): nub tu de ma thag ste phud? lnga rnam dag yin/ /rnam par shes pa sngon du nges par rig par bya/ /sa ni ldog ma yin te chu ni rab gnas ma/ /me ni rig ma yin te rlung ni zhim ste/ /mtshams kyi 'dab ma rnams la mchid par bya bar 'gyur/ /nam mkha' i khams ni nges par bde bar
21a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas ma'o/ /de ltar gzhan ma rnams kyang sna tshogs rnam pa yis/ /lus dang dbang po la sogs gzhan dag mchod par 'gyur/ /ming gi rab tu dbye bas de nyid dngos po mang/ /phyi dang lus po dang ni gang zhig gzhan du gnas/ /khams sogs de nyid rnams kyis so sor mchod par bya//
21a6(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa mo nis? yin chu ni drag mo ste/ /me ni gzhon nu mar 'gyur rlung ni nag mo'o/ /stong pa phag mo yin zhing zla dang nyi ma mi/ /dbang po lha min pad+ma 'dzin dang pad+ma'o/ /ye shes shes ni 'jigs byed zhi ba nyid yin no/ /rnam shes spyan ni 'jigs byed ma ste nges par yin/ /'bar
21a7(rgyud 'grel): ba dang ni phra mo rnam par rgyal ma dang/ /bzang dang phun sum dri med gzhan dang don yod ma/ /glog gi 'od zer dang ni bde kun nyi ma ni/ /sngon du rab tu dbye ba yis kyang rig par bya/ /dbang po rnams la dbang po drug po dgod pa 'dir/ /don dam pa'i rgyu yis mchod par 'gyur ba'o//
21b1(rgyud 'grel): sa dang chu me rlung dang stong pa zla ba dang/ /nyi ma dang ni bdag nyid zhi ba'i rnam brgyad yin/ /rnam pa du ma las kyang? rnam pa brgyad po ni/ /mi shes dbang gis glen pa rnams kyis rab tu brtags/ /'di dag la sogs thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs ni/ /rnal 'byor gro 'phang mi shes pa yis byas pa'o/ /de
21b2(rgyud 'grel): shes gang gi so nus pa'i b+ha ga zhes byar bstan/ /rnam pa gsum du 'dod cing yig gsum rtsa gsum la/ /a dza bu ka zhes bya bzhi po de nyid de/ /de ltar de ni shin tu thim pa'i yul gcig go/ de dbus ling ga gnas shing thog ma'i gzugs yin te/ /thig le nA dad yi snying dbus
21b3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag gnas/ /dga' ba'i tshul du dri med zhi ba ste/ /de yi steng du thog ma 'khrig pa dang po'o/ /yang dag lhung ba'i tshul gyis 'dod pa rnams kyang byed/ /skal ldan b+ha ga zhes bya de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la bzhi po dag dang gzhan yang lnga po dang/ /de bzhin du ni drug dang bzhi dang
21b4(rgyud 'grel): lnga po dang/ /gsum po phyi rol dang ni lus kyi dbus su ste/ /rigs kyi rdzogs pa ma lus pa ni 'di yin no/ /phyi rol rigs kyi ched du bzhi po dus kyi me/ /nyi ma dag dang sgra gcan dang ni zla bar bshad/ /sa la sogs pa lnga po yin te drug po ni/ /bkra shis la sogs yin te
21b5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin bzhi pa ni/ /sa la rab tu dbye bas bzhi po bshad pa'o/ /gzugs la sogs pa lnga po 'di nyid brjod pa yin/ /bar du gsum po dag ni yon tan gsum yin te/ /b+ha ga'i dkyil du phyi mo ma lus don yin no/ /rigs ni yang dag skye phyir thog mar bzhi po ni/ /dga' ba
21b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ni rnam shes rdul dang sa bon no/ /rus pa la sogs 'byung ba las skyes lnga po yin/ /drug po mig la sogs te de nas bzhi po ni/ /lag pa dang ni rkang pa bzung ste lnga po ni/ /sor mo lnga nyid rnams te gsum po gang zhig ni/ /rkang pa dang ni lag pa'i sor mo'i tshigs
21b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum mo/ /rab tu dbye ba 'di ni rigs kyi skye mdo las/ /bzhi pa'i dbye ba 'di ru brgyad po gnyis yin te/ /lnga po mchog gi de rnams nyi shu lnga yin no/ /drug po la ni sum cu rtsa drug ces su grags/ /gzhan yang bcu gnyis de rnams bzhi po'i dbye bas so/ /lnga po'i dbye ba 'di ru
22a1(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu yin pa ste/ /gsum po la ni dbye ba drug cur bshad pa'o/ /rigs kyi rim pa gcig gis nyung ba bdun cu brgyad/ /de nyid bsdus pa ru ni nyi shu rtsa bdun te/ /phyi dang lus po la ni rnam par dpyad nas ni/ /rigs kyi lam la gnas pa rig ni blang bar gyis/ /'di dag
22a2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs ni/ /rnal 'byor go 'phang mi shes rtag par gnas pa dang/ /longs spyod dum la ni 'dod pa can rnams kyis/ /bsod nams rgyu ru yang ni yang dag ston par byed/ /bsod nams mdza' ru slar yang sdig pa nyid yin te/ /sdig pa'i
22a3(rgyud 'grel): mdza' ru yang ni bsod nams nyid yin no/ /tham pa yi dus su 'khor lo 'dir bskor te/ /sa la nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo bzhin du'o/ /yul las byung ba'i sdig dang bsod nams gang zhig ni/ /gang gis rab tu spangs na skad cig gis sreg byed/ /de phyir ye shes chen po'i
22a4(rgyud 'grel): me ni ma nyams pa/ /mnyam pa'i bde ba'i rgyu du bstan par bya ba'i/ /thams cad mkhyen pa gcig yin bla ma gcig yin te/ /de bzhin ye shes gcig yin srid ? mthar pa gcig/ gcig min rgyu du yang ni rnal 'byor nyams pa yis/ /rang dang gzhan gyi don nyams
22a5(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i 'khrug par byed/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas mthu yis bdag gi lta ba ni/ /zhi 'gyur de bzhin me rnams la ni 'gyur bar shog thams cad du ni du ma'i lam la brten pa yi/ sems ni rgyal ba'i thugs rje chen por 'gyur bar shog dpa' 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sprul pa'i sku
22a6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dkar pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// /kha che'i paN+Ti ta zla ba'i mgon pos bsgyur nas gtan la phab pa'o/ /'di la 'gyur byang gcig kyang 'gyur mi 'dra ba gnyis yod pa las/ 'di nyid 'gyur cud bde bar snang ngo// //
22a7(rgyud 'grel): */ dpal ldan dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rgyud la 'jug pa'i bshad sbyar snying po snang ? zhes bya ba bzhugs so// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI ma da bi ma la pra ptA tran+t+ra ba ha ra Ni bA da h+ri da ya lo ka/ bod skad du/ dpal ldan dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od kyi rgyud la 'jug pa'i bshad sbyar snying po
22b1(rgyud 'grel): snang ba/ dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan phyin ci log rtogs gang mngon par byang chub rdo rje bzhi rnams dang/ /rnam thar tshangs pa zhes bya skad cig sku bzang sems dpa' zhes pa dang bcas dang/ rnal 'byor dga' ba bzhi dang nyi ma ri bong can song yan lag
22b2(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa/ mdza' dag rnams kyis 'khor ba rnam dag ston mdzad ston pa de la 'dud gyur cig/ gang gi sngon du byed pa yang dag sbyar ba 'gyur med pa/ /zla ba thig le dag pa rnam rgyas rim pas 'phel gyur pa/ /shes rab las byung sa rnams rnam par rol par byed pa yi/ /dpal
22b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan rgyud kyi rab gsal rdo rje'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngags la sogs pa 'gyur med tshul dang? ldan pa'i chu gter shes rab kyis mthar byed bdag nyid/ /phyugs bdag la sogs bla ma'i bla ma yi yang bla ma dpal ldan byang chub rdo rje ste/ /mnga' bdag mthu yis yang
22b4(rgyud 'grel): dag byang chub rdzogs par mdzad pa'i zhabs kyi chu skyes bdud dang ni/ /nyon mongs lag ldan dbang po'i bum pa 'byed la gcan gzan mchog rnams brtsen la spyi bos 'dud/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis legs par bzlas rnams gang na zhig/ 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang
22b5(rgyud 'grel): pos dpyad pa'ang gang na zhig/ yong ba reg pa ngan pa bdag kyang gang na ste/ /de yis bkod pa'i chal yang dag 'bang byas te/ /'on kyang spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje'i zho sha yis/ /drangs bzhin pa yis de nas 'jig rten 'bad pa yis/ /dpyad pa de rnams dag gis
22b6(rgyud 'grel): dri ma med 'od kyi/ /rgyud la 'jug pa la ni bshad sbyar rnam par bsgrub/ /'dir dang por re zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sprul ba'i sku sa'i bdag po pad+ma dkar po bcom ldan 'das kyis ? du'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel pa dri ma med pa'i 'od rtsom
22b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin pas/ bdud dang bgegs mdza' dag rnam par bzhig pa'i don dang/ rab tu gsal ba'i rdo rje'i gnas rgyud kyi gsang chen las shin tu gsang chen rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ma lus pa rtogs pa'i don du/ mchod tu 'dod pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal ba gsungs pa/ dpal
23a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan dus 'khor la phyag 'tshal zhes pa rgyas par ro/ /dpal gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi nye bar mtshon pa ni bcom ldan 'das dus kyis 'khor lo ste/ dus ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po'i skad cig yin la/ des bskyed pa'i sgrib pa med pa'i
23a2(rgyud 'grel): phung po dang/ khams la sogs pa 'khor lo ste/ gang gi sku 'di yin pa ni dus kyi 'khor lo'o/ /de la phyag 'tshal bar gyur cig ces pa'o/ /stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can zhes pa 'dir 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i shes bya ni stong pa yin la/ de mthong ba ni dngos po
23a3(rgyud 'grel): ? stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mchog dang ldan pa'i shes rab po zhes pa'o/ /'dir phung po rnam par dpyad pa'i stong pa nyid ni ma yin te de gsungs pa/ phung po rnam dpyad stong pa rnams/ /chu shing ji bzhin snying po med/ /rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i/ /stong
23a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid de ltar 'gyur ma yin/ /skyes pa med pa 'gag med pa'i/ /shes bya gang zhig 'dir mthong ba'i/ /stong pa'i dngos po'i stong pa nyid/ /phung po rnam dbyang pa min zhes so/ /ka bde ba 'gog par byed pas na snying rje ste/ /ye shes 'gyur ba med pa'i thabs/ /mngon par
23a5(rgyud 'grel): shes pa drug can no/ /zhes pa'o/ srid gsum skye dang 'jig pa med/ /shes dang shes bya gcig pa'i sku/ /zhes pa srid pa gsum 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams lus dang ngag dang yid kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das
23a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yin la/ ye shes de la ni med de cha bcu drug gcig pa nyid kyi phyir cha bcu drug pa cha med pa nyid las so/ /de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa/ yang yang gtsug tor du 'char ba/ slar yang rdo rje nor bur rdzogs/ /de chags bral las cha nyams pa/ /lus can ye shes
23a7(rgyud 'grel): nyams pa min zhes so/ /de la gang la dngos po ste/ yod pa nyid med pa de skad cig gcig gis mngon par byang chub pa nyid kyi phyir 'dod pa'i srid pa la sogs pa la gnas pa ma yin /'dod pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa la mi gnas/ srid pa dang
23b1(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan las 'das bdag la mi gnas te phan tshun 'gal pa'i phyir la/ 'di dag gi phyi rol yang ma yin te/ gnub shing gtsubs pa las me bzhin 'dod chags chen po'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das so/ /'dir shes pa ni sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba'i mchog tu mi
23b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur pa'i skad cig ste/ shes bya yang khams gsum pa'i dngos po mdza' yas pa mthong ba yin la/ de kho na nyid du rgyu dang 'bras bu dbyer med pa'i phyir 'di dag gcig pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i da'i sku ste/ de ni cha 'gyur ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /des ? rtsa ba'i rgyud du yang
23b3(rgyud 'grel): kun nas phyag dang zhabs la sogs/ /kun nas spyan dang dbu dang zhal/ /kun nas thos ldan 'jig rten du/ /thams cad khyab par byas te gnas shes so/ /tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyis phyi nas khyab par gyi bsdu ba ste/ de'i phyir tshig bzhi rnams kyis sku bzhi'i
23b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das brjod par bya ba yin la/ 'di'i brjod par byed pa yang po ti? dang gzhung dang/ don dang rtogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa bzhi'o/ /phyag 'tshal ba yang rim pas shes bya ste/ ji skad du/ lus kyi spyi bor son pas dang/ lag pa sbyar bas dang/ pus
